143a2(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bde//zhes ston par mdzad do//'dir smras pa/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig
143a3(mdo sde): tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba de'i gtan tshigs brjod par bya ste/ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor mang po dang
143a4(mdo sde): 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ldan pa/'khor rtag tu mi phyed pa/rmad du byung ba'i chos dang cho 'phrul mang po mnga' ba'o zhes sgra grags/gal te de lta na ni 'khor lnga brgyar zad na/
143a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor bye ba can du 'gyur ro//yang 'dir smras pa/'dul ba thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i stobs mnga' bas mnyan yod na de bzhin gshegs pa
143a6(mdo sde): dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes tshig tu gsungs pa/ci dper na mas bu khur du thogs te rang gi yul nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba na rang gi bu spro bsring ba'i
143a7(mdo sde): phyir bu grong 'di nye'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smra ba de bzhin du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba rjes su srung ba rnams dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig go zhes bya ba
143b1(mdo sde): yin nam zhe na/de dag la smras pa/dge slong dag chos kyi gtam 'di ni lan gsum du bzlas pa yin te/de bas na dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ba de dag ni skyes bu'i gtso bo
143b2(mdo sde): rnams yin par rig par bya ste/don gzhan ni ma yin no//dper na khyu mchog re re la'adra ba lang gi tshogs yod pa bzhin du skyes bu'i gtso bo la'ang slob mo lnga brgya yod de/
143b3(mdo sde): re la'ang slob ma lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do//de lta bas na nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ste/'di lta ste/'od srung chen po dang /de bzhin du kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos
143b4(mdo sde): chen po lnga brgya tsam po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa dbang du gyur pa/glang po chen po/cang shes pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol
143b5(mdo sde): ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag
143b6(mdo sde): paba'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol po/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob pa/mi slob pa rnams dang /skyob pa rgyun du
143b7(mdo sde): zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ang ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams dang /zag pa'i chos can gyi dge slong gi tshogs du
144a1(mdo sde): ga ga nal da na pa rgyang chub sosasu dang sa nga 'artson pa kyang yong khyod drug tu yod pa rnams 'dun pa spyags/
144a2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag gi cad kyang 'jam dpalam gtogs pa kyis mngon nam/rtsis mkhan gyi slobams kyang bgrang bar mi nus shing rgyan thos da /rang sangs rgyas
144a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang mi nus pa la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gshegs
144a4(mdo sde): dbang phyug dang /'jam dngapa lo gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
144a5(mdo sde): tshogs tshad med grangs med pa dper na shing chen po snang ba'i shing shun rnams 'byung ba de bzhin du sa chen po 'di shun pa bzhin du brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
144a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po tshad med cing grangs med pa gang yin de dag gi tshad kyang rtsis mkhan nam/rtsis mkhan gyi sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus pa
144a7(mdo sde): lhags pa rnams dang /sring mo'i tshogs dge slong ma des ma la sogs pa dang /ri dgas 'dzin gyi me sa ga dang /btsun mo phreng ldan ma la sogs te/dge
144b1(mdo sde): bsnyen ma du ma dang /khyim bdag bzang sbyin la sogs pa dge bsnyen du ma dag ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyi gung la bzhugs
144b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgo ston to//de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi mal nas langs te bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro
144b3(mdo sde): bar bya'o snyam nas de nas de rang gi mal nas langs pa dang rgyal po gshegs so zhes rnga bo che chen po dag ni rdung /dung dag ni 'bud/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
144b4(mdo sde): ba dan mang po bsgreng ba dag ni nam mkha' la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du kun tu snang ngo //bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas de nas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis
144b5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po dag gi sgra dang /dung dag gi sgra grag pa 'di ci zhig/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sa skyong
144b6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dam pa 'dir mchis te/de'i rnga bo che dag brdungs pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ci'i phyir rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin//
144b7(mdo sde): gsol pa/rgyal po shAkya'i mgon po blta zhing mchi ba des rang gi dpung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'deng gis chos shig ces go bar bgyid pa logs so//bcom
145a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnga bo che 'drangs la chos kyi dung bus shig dang /ngas de nas rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba/
145a2(mdo sde): chos kyi mdo bshad do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnga bo che chen po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo sngon nam yang ma thos lags na rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i chos de ci
145a3(mdo sde): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ci khyod kyis shes par 'gyur snyam mam/re zhig phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
145a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di ltar rnga bo che chen po'i mdo yig 'bru bzhi tsam yang mi shes na/khyod kyis lta sngon ma thos pa ji ltar shes/gsol
145a5(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di de ltar rnyed dka' ba ni ngo mtshar che lags so//de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo mdo 'di ni shin tu rnyed par
145a6(mdo sde): dka' ste/kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po 'di ni 'di lta ste dper na/'jig rten na me tog u dum+ba ra rnyed pa bzhin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'di
145a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung
145b1(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi'ang chos nyid yin no//gsol pa/gal te 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid lags na ca' slad du sangs
145b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu ma bshad cing rab tu ma bstan la/ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
145b3(mdo sde): po mi mchog 'di dag 'dir mchis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dper na 'di na dge slong dgon pa pa 'ga' zhig ri bo 'am/de 'bab chu'i
145b4(mdo sde): 'gram mam/phug cig na 'dug 'dug pa las nam langs nas grong ngam/grong khyer zhig tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir song na ngas sbrul lam/khyi 'am/mi shi ba'i ro 'am/
145b5(mdo sde): shi ba'i ro gang yang rung ba mthong ngo //des de mthong nas e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud bdag kyang yun ring por 'khor bar 'khor ba na/'di lta bu'i gnas skabs
145b6(mdo sde): dag nyams su myong bar gyur pas nga srid pa ni tha chad yin no zhes bya bar gyur to//de nas de dus gzhan zhig na snying dga' bar gyur pa'i chos 'ga' zhig gis yid bde ba
145b7(mdo sde): dang /de nas yang mi sems pa las yang des ro mthong ste/de mthong ba na de yid byung bar gyur nas de phyir zhing grong khyer ram/ri 'or ram/lung pa'i mdor rgyu zhing /
146a1(mdo sde): dadu lta nan kun su nag gtsug len pa'ag/dus nanaganyis lon pa 'am nas byu nas/mar mthong mnos bya bar gang ma 'anan
146a2(mdo sde): dum+b+ha/de mthong gzin pa 'bras bu'i mchog dgra btsam pa mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dgun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
146a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi gtam yang mi gsung /mi rtag pa'i gtam yang mi gsung /bdag med pa dang /myi gtsang ba'i gtam yang mAM gsung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dren
146a4(mdo sde): de dag gi chos nyid yin te/de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji srid bzhugs pa de dag gis dgos pa'i don du ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgo na 'khod pa'i byang
146a5(mdo sde): rgyub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dgA ri zhigs ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams kyi don du ning gi snyigs ma stegs ma 'tshan
146a6(mdo sde): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar 'byung ba ni dka' ba mdzad pa yin te/de stobs na rigs kyi bu drug khyod kyis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes rab tu 'jog par
146a7(mdo sde): mdzad/'doms par mdzad do//de nas de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed par 'dod par 'gyur te/de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed par 'dod pa na de dag pas de rnam
146b1(mdo sde): nyo bar bstan pas de'i phyir de dag mo mdzod kyi 'jog rten gyi khams 'dor 'ong bar 'gyur 'o 'angs nas kha cug nos dang pa zab par 'gyur/kha cog gos nas bdun bdung/
146b2(mdo sde): brgyad pa dang /dgu pa dang /bcu pa'i bar dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de lta bas na rnga 'o che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/
146b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad nyan par 'dod pa'ang de'i phyir ro//kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das legs so//thams cad
146b4(mdo sde): lhags pa legs so//lhags pa legs so//'di dag thams cad kyis shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i mdo 'di 'dra ba thob par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
146b5(mdo sde): spestsol pa/kun dga' bo thams cad kyi thun mong ltar mdo 'di thun mong ma yin pas ldugs pa legs so zhes tshig tu ma brjod cig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du
146b6(mdo sde): thams cad lhags pa legs so//lhags pa logs so zhes mi bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo mdo 'di ni zab cing rtogs pa
146b7(mdo sde): dka' ba/yid ches shing dad par dka' ba/sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba yin te/kun dga' bo de'i phyir 'ongs pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad la lhags pa legs so//
147a1(mdo sde): lhags pa legs so zhes tshig tu ma brjod cig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal g.yul 'byed pa'i
147a2(mdo sde): dus su rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin pa dang /khar dkrol rdebs pa de'i tshe dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyi ma lags sam ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun
147a3(mdo sde): dga' bo rnga bo che de nyid gang gi tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal pha rol gyi dpung dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pa de'i dus su ji tsam na rnga bo che'i sgra byung ba de'i tshe sems
147a4(mdo sde): can dpa' bo dag ni thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can sngar ma'i rigs can gzhan dag ni sgra de thos na de nyid kyis de dag 'chi ba 'am/'chi
147a5(mdo sde): ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de'i phyir rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang mi shes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
147a6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo'i mdo 'di la ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams yid ches par mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de lta bas na rgya des na gang gi tshe
147a7(mdo sde): yul ko sa la'i rgyal po g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus su rgyal po rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba yin te/sangs
147b1(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i dus su gsung bar 'gyur ro//de nas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la bos te/byos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od srungs
147b2(mdo sde): ci dge slong 'di dag dad pa can tshul dang mthun pa/mthu dang ldan pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de'i don ci lags/bka' stsal pa/'od srungs sems
147b3(mdo sde): can srun pa lta bu ma yin pa de dag rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di nyan par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gnas brtan mad+gal kyi bu chen po dang rang
147b4(mdo sde): la smod par bgyid cing /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag kyang gal te de 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mchis na de dag gi nang du mchis pa ma lags na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs
147b5(mdo sde): palta ci smos te/dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa gang lags pa de dag ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di thams
147b6(mdo sde): cad ni tshul khrims bsrung ba/tshul dang mthun pa lags te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na de dag ni tsan+dan gyi snying po 'dra ba sha stag lags so//bka' sprul pa/'od
147b7(mdo sde): srungs 'khor 'di thams cad tshul khrims bsrungs pa/tshul dang ldan pa yin yang ci dgongs pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa'i tshig
148a1(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba ci lags/bka' stsal pa/'od srungs dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba du/
148a2(mdo sde): ltar 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/brtan pa/zhi ba/ther zug pa/yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste/mdo 'di ni
148a3(mdo sde): dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya'o//'od srungs mi mthun pa'i mdo dag pa 'od gsal ba 'di ni sems can dman pa rnams kyis rgyu dang gtan tshigs brgya stong gis rig par bya
148a4(mdo sde): dgos so//'od srung de lta bas na yang khyod kyis re zhig 'khor 'di rtogs shig/de nas de'i tshe gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos sems can lhags pa 'di dag ci 'dra ba
148a5(mdo sde): zhig yin par bltas so//de nas skad cig de nyid la rgya chen po ma yin pa'i sems can rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang /byang
148a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang la smod par byed de/dper na gyad kyi tshogs chen por rgyal po'i gyad stong thub
148a7(mdo sde): pa zhig stan las langs te/'di na kho bo dang lhan cig 'gyed par 'os pa'i rgol phod pa gang yin pa de su yod ces dril bsgrags pa dang /de nas de na rgol bar ma 'os
148b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdag cag gsod par 'gyur gyis 'di dang lhan cig bdag cag 'gyed par mi nus so zhes rang gis rang la smad nas cang mi smra
148b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//de nas gal te des der gyad kyi zla 'ga' yang ma rnyed na de de na dpa' bo gyad zla med du gyur cing ru mtshon 'dzugs pa de bzhin du de na rgya chen po ma yin pa'i sems
148b3(mdo sde): can nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang /theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa rnams kyang bdag cag ni sangs rgyas bcom
148b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das bzhin du yang nga ni rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba ther zug pa yin no zhes ston pa 'di ni rtogs par mi nus so zhes 'dor bar byed do//de
148b5(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag ni yun ring por ston pa nyid kyi lta ba nyams par byed pa'i lta ba bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te/dman pa'i sems can rnams kyis
148b6(mdo sde): mdo dag pa 'di thos nas dong ngo //phyogs bcu de dang de dag nas lhags pa'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang /byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar
148b7(mdo sde): du zhugs pa gang dang gang dag yin pa de dang de dag dang lhan cig tu gang dang gang dag lhags pa de dag las kyang bcu'i cha'i cha dang /brgya'i tshe'i cha dang /stong gi cha'i cha dang /
149a1(mdo sde): brgya stong gi cha'i cha dang /bye ba'i cha'i cha dang /grangs med pa'i cha'i cha gang yin pa dag 'dus par gyur to//de la tsan+dan gyi snying po 'dra bar sbun pa ste
149a2(mdo sde): bu ma yin pa'i dge bsnyen ci 'dra ba dag 'dug par gyur ce na/bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad dang ldan pa dang /gsum 'don pa dang
149a3(mdo sde): bcu bzhi'i dang /bco lnga'i zhes bya ba nas zla ba phyed kyi dang /tshes brgyad kyi dang /cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed kyi bar gyi yan lag brgyad legs par blangs pa sbyin pa
149a4(mdo sde): snyan par smra ba dang /don dpyod pa dang /don mthun pa can gal te mu ge lo bcu 'am/bcu gnyis sam/gzhan yang lo mang po byung yang bdag gis bza' ba
149a5(mdo sde): 'am/bldag pa 'am/zas sam/btung ba rang gi skal ba de las bdag gis pha dang ma gnyis la phyed phyed/dge slong rnams la phyed 'bul zhing bdag gis
149a6(mdo sde): dge slong rnams la mchod yon gyi sbyin pa dor bar mi bya'o snyam pa ste/rigs kyi bu de'i dus ngan pa la rtag par skal ba gang yin pa de tsam zhig yod par 'gyur zhe na/skyes
149a7(mdo sde): bu dpa' bo de'i zla ba phyed kyis zo ma gcig cig 'byung ste/des za ma gcig po'ang dge slong rnams la byin nas bsod nams mi zad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//
149b1(mdo sde): skyes sgyun ston du 'jug nang //sgrom thungam par 'gyur bas gas 'ad rdzus//'don bdag rgyud dag slong na d+ha/dngas sa na la 'ag byud mchag sa pa//
149b2(mdo sde): ni dgra dang chom rkun sogs mang dang //rgya la po chu dang me dang mdza' bshes dang //nye du mi mdza' ba go skal spyod mang gis//sdig pa spyad pa yis ni zad par 'gyur//rang dang ra
149b3(mdo sde): longs spyod dge la yang //spyod par byed pa skyes bu rnams kyi nor//spyad pa nyid dang gnod pa gzhan gyis kyang //zad par mi 'gyur shes bya dam chos phyir//'drir zad byas//
149b4(mdo sde): mchog pha rol zad mi 'gyur//'jig rten 'dir 'phel 'jig rten pha rol tu//zad par mi 'gyur kha dog mthur bcas byed//mthong na thams cad dga' zhing rnyed pa dang //
149b5(mdo sde): mdog dang grags pa rab tu gsal bar 'gyur//de yi phyugs rnams zad par mi 'gyur zhing //de yi blun pho bran mo las byed dang //las kyi mtha' rnams nyams par ma
149b6(mdo sde): te//de la thab mo rtsod dang 'gyed med cing //de ni nam yang gnod sems med mchog thob//sbyin la dga' ba'i skye bos 'jig rten du//de la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob 'gyur
149b7(mdo sde): bas//de lta bas na rtag tu chos 'dod pa//sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig phrad par 'gyur//lus dang srog la mi blta lhug par gtong //mi yi mi mchog de ni lage rkyong
150a1(mdo sde): yin//sems can kun la rjes su snying brtse bas//bu bzhin mthong na sdug cing rig par ldan//bsam gtan brag yod thob pas dpag tu med//khyim
150a2(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i shes rab can gyis ni//rtag tu de ltar bya dgos de dag gi/dpe ni de 'dra mang du yod pa yin//yang de'i tshe na dge bsnyen ma ci 'dra ba dag cig 'dug ce na/ji
150a3(mdo sde): tsam khwa ma langs pa de tsam nas rang gis phyags ma blongs te/rang gi nyen kor 'phyag cing ba'i lci ba'i byug pas sa gzhi byugs pas/sa rgyan gyis mdzes par phyed po'i legs parabya
150a4(mdo sde): babyed pa yin/des der bsod snyoms pa rab tu mang po 'ongs par shes na rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /btung ba gya nom pa legs par rgyun du bstobs par byed cing
150a5(mdo sde): de dag dang bdag grong rdal lam/grong khyer ram/grong dag tu'ang phrad cing 'grogs par gyur cig/bdag nam yang yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang /dge ba'i
150a6(mdo sde): bshes gnyen dang sgrol bar dus ston bzhi byed par ma gyur cig/bdag sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims spyad pa dang /nyan pa dang /bdag chos kyi gtam la rtag tu
150a7(mdo sde): spyod par gyur cig ces de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i sring mo dge bsnyen ma yid rnam par dag po ste/de lta bu dge bsnyen ma'i yon tan dag yin no//de la
150b1(mdo sde): ge slong dang dge slong mtsho nga bdag cig/tsan/rdul ba//bag na bsod pa/dgu bzung ba/ba ma'o lus 'dzin pa/n+dan gyi stong po 'dra ba'i 'khor dgan
150b2(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci 'dra ba dag cig ce na/thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dod pa/thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
150b3(mdo sde): pa'i snying po'i mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po phan pa ston pa/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rtag pa nyid 'dod pa/thams cad kyang
150b4(mdo sde): dgongs pa'i tshig la byang ba/thams cad kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ston pa/sran thub pa/thams cad kyang tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshar gcod cing phan 'dogs par
150b5(mdo sde): zhugs pa nges pa rnams la mchog tu gus pa/theg pa chen po la dad pa chen po thob pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ya mtshan du mi 'dzin pa/'di lta bu'i
150b6(mdo sde): mdo sde rgya chen po mchog bor nas mdo sde gzhan mi sgrogs pa'i shes rab can/gang du sangs rgyas rtag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod do zhes bstan pa gzhan yang
150b7(mdo sde): sgrogs shing mi spong ba/brtan pa/'jig tshogs la lta bas stong pas stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/'dus byas thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ther zug mchog gi gzhi de
151a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan la brten pa dag ste/yon tan lhag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa/'od srung de lta bas na khyod kyis lan gas
151a2(mdo sde): lan gsum du'ang 'khor sol cig/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang bltos shing brtags te bsal na sbun pa lta bu'i skyes
151a3(mdo sde): bu lhag ma'i 'khor dag yod par 'gyur ro//yang lan gsum gyi bar du bsal bas bsal ba na skyes bu sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
151a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis yang gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/'od srung ba 'khor 'di dag dag pa snying por gyur pa yin mong /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
151a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/'od srung 'khor 'dir legs par sbyangs pa legs so legs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'khor yongs su sbyangs pa lags/ston ka'i
151a6(mdo sde): zla ba nya ba la rnam par dag pa bzhin no//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/rtsis mkhan nam/rtsis mkhan gyi slob mas/sngon gyi sdom pas bsdams pa 'god pa'i chas
151a7(mdo sde): phrin lhag ma gang yin pa de 'dug pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'khor lhags pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ces bya ba nas grangs med pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i bar
151b1(mdo sde): snga ma bzhin no//'od srung dri dag las bye ba brgya stong gi cha'i cha gang dag yin pa ni mi mchog bag tsha ba med pa'i 'khor 'dug pa 'di dag yin gyis 'od srung de yang khyod kyis 'khor
151b2(mdo sde): rnams la grogs po dag ci khyed cag rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo chen po yangs pa theg pa gcig pa 'di lta ste/theg pa chen po dad par dka' ba yid ches par dka' ba
151b3(mdo sde): 'di mnyan par nus sam zhes dris shig/'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang 'khor rnams la dris shig/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol
151b4(mdo sde): nas/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
151b5(mdo sde): la spyi bos phyag btsal nas langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas 'khor mang po de la smras pa/shes ldan dag ci rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo nyan pa'i 'os yin nam/
151b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa gcig pa 'di lta ste/theg pa chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa de khyod la ston par 'gyur ro//de
151b7(mdo sde): bzhin du gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang skul ba bskul ba dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung bdag cag dam pa'i chos mnyan
152a1(mdo sde): /nga'i ched du mchis lags pas nyan byar 'artul gyis btsun pa 'od srung dro btsun gshogs pa bdag ga 'dzugs btso bar nye bar 'azung ste/
152a2(mdo sde): rnon po legs par bsgrags pa mdzad du gsol/'od srung chen pos smras pa/ji ltar mid ches par 'gyur/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung dpe rlan
152a3(mdo sde): skyes bu btsas nas lo nyi shu lon pa zhig la bu lo brgya lon pa dag yod do zhes smras pa la gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na bzhin du gsung na/bdag cag gis
152a4(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du yid ches par bgyi lags na btsun pa 'od srung dam pa'i chos mnyan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci
152a5(mdo sde): gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad pa/de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun nas spyan mnga' ba/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa yin no//btsun
152a6(mdo sde): pa 'od srung gzhan yang bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to//smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag ni rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po mnyan pa dang /bklag
152a7(mdo sde): pa dang /gzung ba dang /bstan pa'i 'os yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung 'di ni ji ltar skyes bu btsas nas lo nyi shu lon pa'i bu la
152b1(mdo sde): brgya lon pa dag ltar rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di'ang de 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshogs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das bzhin du dung gnas so zhes bya/
152b2(mdo sde): dang /bdag yod pa ma yin zhing bdag gi yod pa ma yin pa dag la'ang bdag ces bya bas so//de dag gis gsol pa/de ni bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen pas bcom
152b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi lags so//'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po bshad du gsol
152b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnga bo che brdung du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dung bud du gsol/bka' stsal pa/'od srung legs so legs so//'od srung da ni
152b5(mdo sde): khyod rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po nyon cig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mnyan par bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gal te
152b6(mdo sde): bdag gi spyod yul du ma gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rnga bo che chen po'i slad du bdag la gus par mdzad lags pas so//yang gsol pa/ji ltar lags she na
152b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 'di skad ces 'od srung khyod nga dang lhan cig 'dug gis tshur shog ces gsungs te/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni don de'i slad du bgyi ba gzo/
153a1(mdo sde): bar bgyis pa tshor bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung legs so legs so//ngas kyang don 'di'i phyir gsungs so///
153a2(mdo sde): 'od srung dper na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis glang po che dang /rta dang /dmag mi rnams kha zas dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /bldag pa la sogs pas gsor
153a3(mdo sde): 'jug go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang gi tshe bdag rnga bo che dang /rdza rnga dang /dung gi sgra shin tu chen po 'byin pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag
153a4(mdo sde): bsgreng ba dang /gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs chen po nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gis gsor gtsug pa'i phan yon rjes su dran nas pha rol gyi
153a5(mdo sde): dmag tshogs dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur zhing de'i tshe sems can rnams la'ang phan pa byed par 'gyur/bdag gis bkra' la'ang phan pa byed par
153a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam ste/de dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro//'od srung de bzhin dung yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang khyod kyis rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro//zhes
153a7(mdo sde): ngas khyod la stan gyi phyed bstan pa smin gyis nges pa kho nar de bzhin du gyis shig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khyod kyis thugs las skyes pa'i sras kyi
153b1(mdo sde): bubyor gzhag pa'i rigs lags so//bka' stsal pa/'od srung dpor na/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi bu rnams la 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag gi rigs
153b2(mdo sde): 'tshe bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan bcos sna tshogs dang /bzo'i gnas rnams la sbyong bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od srung khyod kyang nga 'das nas mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro//'o
153b3(mdo sde): srung dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsali rgyal rgyal po mang pos bsngos nas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pa de dong de'i dus kyi dmag mi glang po che ba dang /rta pa dang
153b4(mdo sde): dpung bu chung gang dag yin pa las/go cha bzang po dgos shing rje bo che chen po dang /dung gi sgra thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing brid par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la ni rgyal
153b5(mdo sde): ngos bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /rgyan dang /lhab lbub dang /chas dag sbyin par byed do//de las gzhan pa g.yul ngor zhugs
153b6(mdo sde): nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i dmag mi gang yin pa de dag la ni gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig la sogs pa dang /grong rdal dang /yul rnams sbyin par byed do//de na
153b7(mdo sde): skyes bu dpa' bo sde dang bcas par phyir mi ldog pa/glang po che ba dang /rta pa dang /shing rta pa dang ldan pas dgra'i dpung pham par byed pa gang yin po de dag ni rgyal po rang
154a1(mdo sde): gis rig par byas nas rgyal 'chab tu dbang bskur ba'i cod pan baning bar byed do//'od srung de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang /dge slong ma
154a2(mdo sde): dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma bslab pa legs par ji ltar bcas pa la legs par bslabs pa gang yin pa de dag dang /so sor thar pa'i sdom pas
154a3(mdo sde): bsdams pa dang /'dul ba'i cho ga dang /spyod yul la gnas pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas lha dang mi'i bde basbyin par mdzad do//de las gzhan pas
154a4(mdo sde): phung po'i bdud dang /nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /'chi bdag gi bdud dang /lha'i bu'i bdud pham par byed pa gang yin pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas
154a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rnam par grol ba'i cod pan 'ching bar mdzad do//de las gzhan pa rgya chen po la lhag par mos pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i
154a6(mdo sde): che ba'i bdag nyid rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba dang /ther zug pa 'dod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad
154a7(mdo sde): kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes theg pa chen po dbang bskur ba'i cod pan 'ching bar mdzad do//'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyang de ring theg pa chen po
154b1(mdo sde): dbang nga bskur ba'i cod pan bcings te/sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang ba'i spyan snga nas rnga bo che chen po'i mad 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro//de lta bas na 'od srung khyod kyis kyang da nang //
154b2(mdo sde): 'das nas mdo 'di 'byung ba'i rigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das re zhig bdag gis rigs par lho rngo ma thog kyang bcom ldan 'das re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa
154b3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang bdag gis phyung nas bstan par bgyi lags so//bka' stsal pa/'od srung legs so//da ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnga bo
154b4(mdo sde): che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo chen po bshad pa brtsam mo//de nas nam mkha' las lha'i tshogs dang /'brug gi tshogs kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/'od srung //legs
154b5(mdo sde): so legs so//sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir da ni lha rnams dang /'brug gi tshogs rnams kyang me tog gi char 'bebs shing bdud rtsi'i chus gang
154b6(mdo sde): ba'i phye ma'i char gyi rgyun chen po'ang 'bebs so//'od srung khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang thugs las skyes pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bor 'os so//de nas//
154b7(mdo sde): lha'i tshogs dang /'brug gi tshogs kyis skad mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//mnyan yod grong khyer dag tu rnga chen dang //shin du rnga chen dung rnams sgrogs pa na//
155a1(mdo sde): mgon po chos kyi rje yis rgyal byed kyi//tshal du chos kyi rnga chen sgrogs par mdzad//'od srung khyod kyis chos rnga brdung bar gyis//chos kyi rgyal po dag
155a2(mdo sde): gis gsungs pa'i mdo//zhu ba'i dbyug gus chos rnga che brdungs na//lha'i lhas chos mang the tshom gcod par mdzad//rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po las 'od srung 'ongs
155a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i le'u'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od srung ngas sngar
155a4(mdo sde): mdo 'di las gong nas gong du dge slong yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can zhes bya ba zhig yod ces bshad pa dge slong de'i ming dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge
155a5(mdo sde): bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi zug rngu
155a6(mdo sde): rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'tsho byed kyi bu sman mchog ces bya ba yod de/de
155a7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur la de nas rgyal pos g.yul shom pa na sman pa sman mchog bkug ste/
155b1(mdo sde): bkug nas 'di skad ces/kye sman pa sman gang gis sems can gang dang gang dag zug rngus zug par gyur pa'i sems can de dang de dag ji lta ji ltar zug rngu 'byung bar 'gyur
155b2(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i sman da sbyor la myur du khyer te shog cig/de nas sman pa sman mchog des sman gyi rgyal po dug sman rtol ba zhes bya ba khyer nas rgyal po chen po g.yul ngor 'jug
155b3(mdo sde): pa'i rnga bo che la sman do byugs shing bdugs te brdungs so//byugs shing bdugs te brdungs ma thag tu sems can zug rngus zug par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis
155b4(mdo sde): sgra dpag tshad dam/dpag tshad gnyis su thos nas thos pa tsam gyis sems can de dang de dag thams cad kyi zug rngu rnams dbyung bar 'gyur/zug rngu rnams gsal bar
155b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//'od srung de bzhin du dge slong yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can de'i ming thos pa'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang //
155b6(mdo sde): gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/des de'i bstan pa la mdo 'di phyung zhing rgyas par byas te/de bas na chos dang ldan pa mngon sum
155b7(mdo sde): du byas pa de'i mthu'o//'od srung ltos/re zhig rgyal po'i rnga bo che sems med pa phal pa de'ang sems dang bcas pas sman gyis byugs shing bdugs te brdungs ma thag
156a1(mdo sde): tu sems can rnams la phan pa skyed par byed na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can gyi ming thos pas sems
156a2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/gal te de ltar re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i ming thos pas sems can rnams
156a3(mdo sde): kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sangs rgyas bcom
156a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa 'am/yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/gal te de ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan tsam
156a5(mdo sde): gyis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur na sems can la phan pa ston pa zhig gis rnga bo che chen
156a6(mdo sde): po'i mdo 'di las 'gres sam/tshigs su bcad pa 'am/tshig 'ga' tsam mam/ming tsam bstan pa 'am/le'u ston na sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang //
156a7(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngas dge slong dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems
156b1(mdo sde): kyi smon lam 'grub bo zhes bshad de/sngon smon lam legs par sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid yin te/'dri lta/
156b2(mdo sde): ste/rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen pos ma byas pa/ma byung ba ma 'gags pa'o//'od srung khyod kyang de lta bas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir
156b3(mdo sde): zhe na/khyod kyi'ang ming thos pa'i dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa de dag dang /sems can de dag thams cad kyi 'dod
156b4(mdo sde): chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur ro//de'i phyir 'od srung khyod kyang mdo 'di zhus nas yun ring por 'jig rten du 'byin par
156b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta lags na rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po de las phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig bdag la legs par bshang du gsol/
156b6(mdo sde): 'od srung dus la bab kyis khyod nga la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhus shig/'od srung gis legs so zhes gsol nas zhu ba 'di zhus so//bcom ldan 'das gang na srid yod
156b7(mdo sde): srid pa der sdug bsngal//gang na srid med sdug bsngal med pa yi//mya ngan 'das pa de ni mchog tu bde//bde sdug spang phyir mya ngan 'das mchog 'gyur//srid pa
157a1(mdo sde): yod na bde dang sdug bsngal to//srid pa meng na bde dang sdug bsngal med//de phyir mya ngan 'das thob 'dod pa yis//rigs kyi bu yis srid 'dod yongs/
157a2(mdo sde): su gcad//ces bka' stsal pa 'di'i don ci lags/'dir tshigs su bcad pas legs par bka' stsal pa/srid pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan la//thams cad
157a3(mdo sde): du yang snying po med pas na//srid pa gang yin de ni sdug bsngal te//gang la srid med de na sdug bsngal med//srid pa yod pa min na sdug bsngal med//'di na srid yod sdug
157a4(mdo sde): bsngal 'gyur bas na//srid la mngon par dga' bar mi bya zhing //srid pa rnams la yid brtan 'gro mi bya//bcom ldan srid dang srid pa med pa dang //bde dang sdug bsngal
157a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yod par ston//de skad gsungs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal to//'od srung de ltar tshig gi don 'di ni brten pa'i
157a6(mdo sde): rlig gi don yin pas re zhig 'od srung khyod kyis mi shes so//sems can ni phal cher srid pa gcod par mi byed do/sems can rnams ni 'du byed sdud pas brgyus//
157a7(mdo sde): srid med mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bdo//'od srung gis gsol pa/gang gis mya ngan 'das thob pa//mya ngan 'das pa de mi gnas//de la bde ba ming tsam ste//mis
157b1(mdo sde): ni myong bar 'gyur ma mchis//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thar pa brtan pa ming tsam yin//yod dang med dang ther zug gzhi//de lta bas na 'di ni nyan thos
157b2(mdo sde): dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin zhing spyod yul ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs kyang lags la ther zug kyang lags/bcom
157b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung dper na/lho phyogs kyi yul skye bo'i bcom brlag ces bya ba nas sems can gzhan 'ga' zhig 'ongs par gyur la/mi de la mi
157b4(mdo sde): 'ga' zhig gis khyod gang nas 'dir 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /de nas des smras pa/kho bo ni lho phyogs kyi bcom brlag nas 'ongs so//mis yang smras pa/de yul gyi
157b5(mdo sde): phyogs gang na yod/de nas mi des mdzub mos lho phyogs kyi lam gyi nam mkha' bstan na/'od srung mi des mi de la ji ga yid ches par 'gyur ram/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
157b6(mdo sde): song na de mthong bar 'gyur ro//'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyis ma mthong bar dad pas yid ches par gyis shig//'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i
157b7(mdo sde): le'u//bam po gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to//ji ltar mkha' la mdzub mos ston pa ltar//de bzhin thar pa ming
158a1(mdo sde): tsam gyis bstan to//ji ltar lho phyogs bcom brlag mi bzhin du//de bzhin pa nyid brtan pa med nas byon//'od srung 'di lnga yang dag don mthong
158a2(mdo sde): nA/rgyu ni dgos pa yod med de//mngon sum ma gyur don la ni//rgyu dang rkyen kyang de bzhin no//'od srung de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu du mas thar pa'i
158a3(mdo sde): tshig gi don nye bar ston par mdzad do//bka' stsal pa/'od srung rgyu zhes bya ba ci yin par 'dod/gsol pa/rgyu ni byed rgyu zhes bgyi ba legs so//bcom ldan 'das
158a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/rkyen ces bya ba gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rkyen ces bgyi ba de ni rten lags so//bka' stsal pa/'od srung
158a5(mdo sde): rigs pa'i dpe dang /rgyu dang nye bar sbyar ba dang /byed rgyu rnams kyis de ji lta bu yin pa de kho na de bzhin du gsal bar ston cig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
158a6(mdo sde): dper na pha dang ma gnyis 'dus pa lngas bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/de la mu ni rgyu lags so//pha ni rkyen lags te/de lbu bas na pha dang ma gnyis ni bu'i rgyu dang rkyen
158a7(mdo sde): lags so//de bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen gyis chos skye bar 'gyur te/'di ni grub pa zhes bgyi'o//grub pa zhes bya ba ci yin/grub pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'jig rten
158b1(mdo sde): glags pa lags s+ho//'jug rten zhes bya ba ci yin/'od srung gis gsol pa/sems can dang ldan pas btags pa gang lags pa'o//sems can zhes bya ba ci yin/
158b2(mdo sde): sems can zhes bgyi ba ni chos kyi brdar btags pa lags so//chos zhes bya ba ci yin/gsal po/chos ma lags pa'i chos dang /chos kyi chos so//chos de dag
158b3(mdo sde): kyad rnam pa gnyis sku bstan to//rnam pa gnyis gang lags she na/'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /gzugs can dang /gzugs can ma lags pa ste/
158b4(mdo sde): de las mya gsum pa ni ma mchis pa legs so//de la chos zhes bya ba ji lta bu yon/gsol pa/chos zhes bgyi ba ni gzugs ma mchis pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/
158b5(mdo sde): rjechos ma yin pa ji lta bu yin chos ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba de'ang gzugs ma mchis pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/gal te chos dang chos ma yin pa gzugs med
158b6(mdo sde): cing mtshan ma med pa yin na de la chos ni gang /chos ma yin pa ni gang /gsol pa/chos zhes bgyi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba lags so//chos ma
158b7(mdo sde): lags pa zhes bgyi ba ni sred pa zhes bgyi ba lags so//bka' stsal pa/gal te de ltar chos dang chos ma yin pa gzugs med cing mtshan nyid med pa yin na
159a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar ci zhig mtshan ma gang gis 'di ni chos yin no zhes rnam par mkhyen par 'gyur/gsol pa sems can rnams
159a2(mdo sde): 'khor bar skyes nas dge ba'i bsod nams dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs la bsten pa na de'i tshul 'di dang /de de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par smad
159a3(mdo sde): pas dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad kun tu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par spyod pa gang lags pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni chos legs
159a4(mdo sde): so//sems can rnams 'khor bar skyes nas bsod nams ma lags pa/sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu spyod cing chos ma lags pa kun spyod pa/de kho na
159a5(mdo sde): la sdig pa mi dge ba'i mtshan nyid de dag thams cad skye bar 'gyur te/de ltar chos ma lags pa kun tu spyod pa gang legs pa de lta bu'i sems can de ni chos ma
159a6(mdo sde): lags pa lags so//de la sems can zhes bgyi ba ni nang gi sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /khams bzhis
159a7(mdo sde): yang dag par bsdus shing btags pa dang /mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi skye mched drug dang /dbang po lnga dang /tshor ba dang /
159b1(mdo sde): 'du shos dang /sems pa dang /soms dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste/de ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gsum gyi bar ni chos thams cad ces bgyi ba lags
159b2(mdo sde): so//bka' stsal pa/'od srung de dag kho na la sems can gyi chos zhes bya ni/de la sems can zhes bya ba'i chos gang yin zhe na/gsol pa/de la sems can
159b3(mdo sde): zhes bgyi bar baitags pa'i chos 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slod du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba
159b4(mdo sde): gang lags pa de'i rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba gang lags/bka' stsal pa/'od srung rnga bo che gang yin pa de nyid rnga bo che yin par shes par bya ste/rnga bo che zhes bya ba ni
159b5(mdo sde): pags pa dang /dbyug gu dang /shing leb dang /chos 'di gsum tshogs pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag la rnga bo che zhes bya'o//gsol pa/de la brdung ba'i mi la rnga
159b6(mdo sde): po che zhes bgyi ba lags sam/bka' stsal pa/mi med par yang rnga bo che rlung gis bskyod pa na sgra 'byung ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/rnga bo che
159b7(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba chos sam/'on te chos ma lags pa lags/bka' stsal pa/rnga bo che zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyang ma yin/chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin no//gsol pa
160a1(mdo sde): de ci zhes bgyi/bka' stsal pa/chos gang zhig chos gang dang yang lhan cig ldan pa ma yin zhing /chos ma yin pa dang yang ma yin pa 'di lung du ma
160a2(mdo sde): bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/gal te lung du ma bstan pa'i chos shig mchis na des ni 'jig rten na chos gsum mchis par 'gyur ro//bka' stsal pa/
160a3(mdo sde): lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ji ltar skyes pa'ang ma yin/bud med kyang ma yin pa ltar ma ning zhes bya'o//dper na ji lta bu lags/bka' stsal pa/
160a4(mdo sde): 'od srung khyod kyis 'di ni pha dang ma 'dus pa'i bu yin no zhes smras pa gal te pha dang ma 'bras bu med par gyur na kha cig 'di skad ces ma dang phra ni rgyu dang rkyen ma yin no/
160a5(mdo sde): zhes smras par 'gyur ro//yang bka' stsal pa/sems can gyi sa bon gyi dngos po med pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'bras bu med pas de dag ni rtag tu ma ning zhes bya
160a6(mdo sde): bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'od srung dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig lhag par nyam nga bar gyur
160a7(mdo sde): pa na brgya la ji zhog ltar gyur po de'i tshe/de'i drung du dbang thang gis 'tsho ba dag de dang lhan cig rjes su mi 'brang zhing sgrol bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de dag bud med dang
160b1(mdo sde): 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//gsol pa/ci'i slad du/bka' stsal pa/rgyal po rnams ni kau shras 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyi rang bzhin brtags nas gsor 'jug go/rgyu des na/
160b2(mdo sde): sa bon med pa'i sems can de dag pa dang mar mi 'gyur bas sems can de dag nI rtag par ma ning yin par blta bar bya'o//yang bka' stsal pa/dge ba'i chos dang /mi dge
160b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos dang /lung du ma bstan pa'i chos te/dge ba'i chos ni tshor ba bde ba yin no//mi dge ba'i chos ni tshor ba sdug bsngal ba yin no//lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni tshor ba bde ba'ang ma
160b4(mdo sde): yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa yin te sems can rnams ni chos 'di gsum gyis rtag tu reg par 'gyur ro//de la tshor ba bde ba zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi rnams kyi
160b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yin no//tshor ba sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /yi dgas kyi 'jig rten gyi yin no//tshor ba bde
160b6(mdo sde): ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa ni ji ltar 'brum bu phra mo dang /shu ba yin te de la 'brum bu phra mo dang /shu bas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams ni lung du
160b7(mdo sde): ma bstan pa yin nam/'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir/gsol pa/bde ba las sdug bsngal 'byung
161a1(mdo sde): zhing sdug bsngal las kyang sdug bsngal 'byung bas 'di gnyis ka lung du ma bstan pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/ci kha zas las nad byung ngam
161a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/gang gi tshe 'tshal ba de'i tshe bde ba zhes bgyi ba lags so//gang gi tshe nang du gyur ba/de'i tshe sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba lags na/de la shu ba gang legs pa de
161a3(mdo sde): ni lung du ma bstan pa zhes bgyi lags so//bka' stsal pa/gal te de lta bas na bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'ang lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya la pha dang ma dang bu'ang lung du ma
161a4(mdo sde): bstan par 'gyur ro//gsol pa de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/'o na ji lta bu yin/gsol pa/de ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min la sogs pa'i lha ther
161a5(mdo sde): zug gi gzhi zhes mi bgyi ba lta bu'i chos dge ba 'di'ang de dang 'dra lags so//bka' stsal pa/'od srung khyod kyis tshor ba dang /'du shes la sems can no zhes smras pa/
161a6(mdo sde): des na 'du shes med 'du shes med min la sogs pa'i lha dag sems can ma yin par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de rnams la'ang 'du byed kyi ngo bo ma
161a7(mdo sde): mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/'o na tshor ba dang /'du shes ma gtogs pa'i chos 'di dag la sems can zhe 'am/'on te kha cig de lta bu'i sems can dag yod
161b1(mdo sde): do zhes zer na/des na 'di ltar sems can ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa dag sems can du 'gyur ro//ci'i slad du/sems can gzugs can yin nam/'on te gdugs
161b2(mdo sde): can ma yin/gsol pa/gzugs can yang ma lags/gzugs can ma lags pa'ang ma lags mod kyi chos de dag dang ldan pa ni sems can zhes bgyi lags so//bka'
161b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/gal te de ltar sems can ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa de dag sems can du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs med pa zhes bya'o//ji ste de ltar gyur na 'jig rten du chos
161b4(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis po gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa de 'byung bar 'gyur te/chos gzugs can dang /chos ma yin pa gzugs can no//thar pa chos dang lhan cig gam//
161b5(mdo sde): 'on te chos ma lags pa dang lhan cig lags/gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha la'ang thar pa mchis pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin te/chos 'dus byas dang /
161b6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas pa yod pas/de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i lha de dag kyang 'dus byas kyi nang du bgrang bar 'gyur gyi thar pa ni 'dus ma byas yin no//gsol pa/des ni gzugs
161b7(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i lha rnams kyang gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur lags so//'od srung ji ltar 'dus byas thams cad gzugs can yin pa dang /'dus ma byas gzugs can ma
162a1(mdo sde): yin par gsal bar spros shig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha rnams gzugs dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba'i gzugs sangs rgyas
162a2(mdo sde): yul du 'gyur ba lags grang /bdag cag gi yul du ni mi 'gyur lags so//bka' stsal pa/'od srung legs so legs so//de bzhin du thar par gshegs po'i
162a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang nga'i yul yin te/de rnams kyang gzugs can yin la thar pa de'ang gzugs can yin no//yang bka' stsal pa/'od srung ci
162a4(mdo sde): khyod kyis gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i gnas dang phyed pa yang dag par shes sam/yang bka' stsal pa/'od srung ci khyod kyis gzugs can gyi lha rnams gzugs
162a5(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ba'i nang du bgrang ngam/cin bdag cag gi yul ma lags so zhes zer/yang bka' stsal pa/thar pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas blo shin tu rnam par dag pa
162a6(mdo sde): rnams kyang de kho na bzhin du gzugs zhes bya bar gsal bar yang dag par ltos shig/'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na thar pa thob pa gnas pa'i phyir
162a7(mdo sde): yang bde ba dang /sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags so//bka' stsal pa/sems can nad pa zhig sman bcud kyis len 'thungs nas nad dang bral bar gyur na ci'ang nang
162b1(mdo sde): bucan du 'gyur ram/gal te 'ga' zhig mchis na nges par 'gyur lags so//bka' stsal pa/gal te las med kyang 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
162b2(mdo sde): lags so//bka' stsal pa/'od srung bde ba dang sdug bsngal spangs pa de nyid thar pa yin te/nad ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal lta bu yin par mi lta bur ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob
162b3(mdo sde): par blta'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/bde ba dang sdug bsngal spangs pa zhes bgyi ba las ma mchis pas nad zad pa thob pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/
162b4(mdo sde): thar pa thob pa ni 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi las gang yin pa de dang bral zhing zad pa bzhin no//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du'ang 'gum par mi 'gyur lags//
162b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/nam mkha' nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes pa/ci nam mkha' dpe med pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bu yin nam/de bzhin du thar pa
162b6(mdo sde): ni dpe med pa yin no//ji ltar gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs yod kyang dga' ba de dang de lta bus gnas pa mi shes pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
162b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi thar pa'ang btags pa med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' yang mi rtag pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/dper na ji lta bu ji ltar rgyal po
163a1(mdo sde): gsal rgyal gyi khang bzang dang pa ltar dkar ba brtsigs pa de'i tshe nam mkha' nyams pa de ni nam mkha' zhig pa zhes bgyi lags so//bka' stsal
163a2(mdo sde): pa/chos gzugs med pa ji ltar 'jig/gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyang de ltar 'jig lpags/bka' stsal pa/gzugs med pa'i lha gang dag yin pa de dag
163a3(mdo sde): sems can zhes bgyi bar bgrang ngam ci/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' sems ma mchis pa sems dang bcas pa ji ltar 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/nam mkha'
163a4(mdo sde): la brten pa'i khang pa 'am/ri gang dang gang dag yin pa zhig kyang nam mkha' mi 'jig pa ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'ang de dang
163a5(mdo sde): 'dra'o//rten nam mkha' mi 'jig pa lhur byed pa po dang /tshor ba po'ang de dang 'dra lags sam/bka' stsal pa/'od srung mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus ni/sems can
163a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi las dang /nyon mongs pa'i chos yod pa gang yin pa 'jig par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad dang /chos thams cad ma mchis pa
163a7(mdo sde): lta bu lags/rnga bo che'i tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin no//yang gsol pa/ji ltar gdugs kyi 'od dang /nor bu'i 'od gnyis po de las 'jig rten na zhugs zhes bgyi ba de
163b1(mdo sde): bzhin du ma rnams las bdag gir bya ba zhes pakye na bcom ldan 'das chos gcig pa 'di gang gi rnam par smin pa lags/bka' stsal pa/'od srung khyod kyis mi shes sam/
163b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so//bka' stsal pa/zla ba byung ba smros shig/bcom ldan 'das zla ba ni sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i
163b3(mdo sde): chos ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/gal te de lta na dpe brjod dgos te/tso ste nor bu dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /me sems can gyis ma byas kyi/tshogs pas byas
163b4(mdo sde): pa yin na/steng gi lha rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i nyi ma dang /zla ba de dag ci sems can ma yin nam/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yongs su mya ngan las
163b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi bar du sems can zhes bgyi bas de dag kyang sems can gyi grangs su bgrang ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni sems can ma yin no//
163b6(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du lags/sems can grong ba'i bA shes gnyen can phal pa ma yin pa'ang sems can rnams dang mnyam par mi rtsibs/sangs rgyas ni rnam par smin pa las
163b7(mdo sde): skyes pa'i chos kyi rgyu mthun pa ste/sangs rgyas ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin la/sems can yang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos kyi rgyu mthun pa yin no//
164a1(mdo sde): 'od srung gang gi tshe sems can thams cad zad par gyur pa de'i tshe/gal te me byung nas 'jig pa 'am/'byung bar 'gyur ba de spros shig/bcom
164a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma 'tshal lags so//ngas sngar khyod kyi mi shes so zhes gsungs so//bcom ldan 'das skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba gling nas mchis/gang
164a3(mdo sde): du mchis lags/bka' stsal pa/rnga bo che'i sgo gang nas 'ongs/gang du 'gro/bcom ldan 'das tshogs pa las lags so//bka' stsal pa/ji lta bu yin/ji ltar
164a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad ma bgyis paM/byed pa po ma mchis pa/byed pa po dang bral ba ltar rnga bo che'i sgra'ang de dang 'dra lags so//bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin te/rnga bo che la ni
164a5(mdo sde): byed pa po yod dam/bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa ther zug gi gzhi thob pa'i sems can de dag su zhig
164a6(mdo sde): byed de byed pa po med do//sems can rnams rang gi bdag nyid kyis bdag byed de/ji lta zhe na/sems can gyis gal te bsod nams byed na ni sangs rgyas yin la/'on
164a7(mdo sde): te mi byed na ni sems can yin no//sems can thog ma sus bgyis lags/bka' stsal pa/'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lho la sogs pa gzugs med pa'i
164b1(mdo sde): lha rnams kyang sus byas/gson por yang ji ltar gnas/bcom ldan 'das las kyis ni gnas lags na de dag gi las dang de bzhin du khyim bdag tshong dpon ngang tshul can
164b2(mdo sde): yang 'tshal bar ni rngo mi thog lags so//shin tu gnas pa nyid du su zhig byed/gsol pa/las kyis bgyid do//las las ni chos du ma skyes te/dge ba las kyang chos du ma
164b3(mdo sde): skyes pa'o//de la dge ba las skye ba'i chos ni gang dag lags mi dge bas skye ba ni gang dag lags/bka' stsal pa/las las ni srid pa skye'o//dge ba'i las las ni thar
164b4(mdo sde): po skye'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma skyes pa'i gnas dge ba la ji ltar skye bar 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid las so//gal te
164b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dge ba las skye ba lags na/mi skye ba'i gnas ji ltar 'thob lags/bka' stsal pa/legs par spyad pa'i las kyis so//de sus bslabs lags/bka'
164b6(mdo sde): sprul pa/thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs so//thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus thams cad su zhig gis mngon par sprul cing bslabs lags/bka' stsal pa/
164b7(mdo sde): thog ma med pa'i ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes pa 'am bsam par mi nus so//gal te 'jig rten du shA ri'i bu lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa'i
165a1(mdo sde): mi 'ga' zhig byung ste/des 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dang po gang yin zhes dus ring po mtha' yas par rtag tu bsams kyang
165a2(mdo sde): shes pa 'am bsam par mi nus kyi de'i bar skabs su mya ngan las 'dra' bar 'gyur ba kho nar zad do//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mad+gal gyi bu chen
165a3(mdo sde): po lta bu dag phyi ma'i mtha' yas par rtag tu rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /zhing blta ba rtogs par mi nus te/byang chub
165a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu thob pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin no//yang bka' stsal pa//
165a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can 'byung ba'ang de kho na bzhin du shes par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byed pa po dang /tshor ba po'ang ma
165a6(mdo sde): mchis pa ma lags sam/bka' stsal pa/'od srung byed pa po dang /tshor ba po ni rgyu yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di la bas pa mchis
165a7(mdo sde): sam/'on te ma mchis/bka' stsal pa/'jig rten la ni nam yang ji ltar yang lan 'ga' yang zad pa med do//yang bka' stsal pa/'od srung khyod la dpe bstan
165b1(mdo sde): par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu lags/bka' stsal pa/'od srung dper na rgya mtsho zad mi shes pa la ma 'ga' zhig gis skra'i rtse mos bcus na/ba lang gi rmig rjes

172b7(mdo sde): phyin par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di mnyan na gang ni phan pa ston pa yod pa de dang de kho nar btsal na rnyed par 'gyur ro//dper na gang na 'khor las
173a1(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal ba mad pa don khams kyi rgyal bya dang /skyobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /rgyal phran gyi tshogs rnams 'byung ngo //de shin du gdun/
173a2(mdo sde): sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'tshod par mi 'gyur ba der phan pa ston pa 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid kyi le'u dang ldan pa phul ba gzhan sbyin cing 'i chud par 'gyur ro//
173a3(mdo sde): tshe de dag gis mdo sde de lta bu mang po dag mthong thos nas sems can de dag slob cing de dag gis lobs nas gleng gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs
173a4(mdo sde): brtag pa'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag thos na de dag yid gnyis dang /the tshom 'thob cing blo phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro//the tshom dang blo phyin ci log tu gyu
173a5(mdo sde): nas ci nas kyang phan pa ston pa la 'phya'ang rung mi 'phya'ang rlung /dga' bar byed kyang rung /mgu bar byed kyang rung /brnyas par byed kyang rung /rtog par byed kyang rung /'di
173a6(mdo sde): skad ces ci 'di rang bzor byas pa zhog gam/'on te 'di bstan pa nyams par bdud kyis bsams nas byas pa zhig ces smra zhing bsams nas de dag gi drung nas log
173a7(mdo sde): rang rang gi yum du dong nas yon tshun tshul khrims nyams par byed/lta ba nyams par byed par 'gyur gyi/de dag gis med sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thob par ni ma
173b1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang na phan pa ston pa der mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i tshe 'jig rten 'dir sems can mang po mang po drug gis mthong zhing
173b2(mdo sde): bos nas theg pa chen po la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur gyis zhum par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dus 'di ni snyigs ma lnga'i dus yin/dus 'don bstan pa nyams
173b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba yin pas sems can mang po dag theg pa chen po la shin tu skur pa 'debs por 'gyur ro//dper ni khyim bdun gyi grong la 'gran bu gcig yod pa de
173b4(mdo sde): bzhin du gang na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu spyod pa de na'ang skye bo bdun las gcig ni gdon mi za bar dam pa'i chos spong bar 'gyur ro//'di lta ste/tshul khrims
173b5(mdo sde): mtshungs pa de dag gis tshul khrims dag pa mthong nas yi rangs par gyur cing phan tshun gcig la gcig tshul khrims nyams par byed pas dga' bar 'gyur ro//de la
173b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/gang zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di thos shing mdo sde de dag gi chos ston pa la sogs pa mthong na 'di ltar yid la gcags nas
173b7(mdo sde): nani phyir phyogs par byed cing gtom 'di lta bu dag smra ste/de la sems can gyi khams ni gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtag pa 'am/rang bzhin
174a1(mdo sde): rtag pa nyid ni gang yangs pa'i mdo bstan pa 'dri'i gtam ni ci yin zhes kha gzhan du bltas te/sems par byed cing de dag 'di dag ni bdag gi
174a2(mdo sde): phyogs byed par 'gyur ro zhes de dag phan tshun du byams par byed cing de ltar rim gyis rang bzhin la 'jog par byed/de dag gi rang bzhin dang rang bzhin gcig
174a3(mdo sde): par byed do//dper na bram ze'i khyim mam khyim bdag gi khyim na khye'u 'ga' zhig spyod pa ma yin pa la zhugs par gyur pa na de pha dang mas bzlog ste/de de las
174a4(mdo sde): bzlog pa na spyod pa ma yin pa de las ldog tu ma btub nas ji tsam ni de rang gi khyim nas byung ste/byung nas khye'u gzhan zhig dang lhan cig 'dris par byed do//de nas
174a5(mdo sde): khye'u des khye'u de'ang khrid nas mnga' 'am/bud pa'i rtsed mo 'am/rtsed mo gang yang rung ba dag gis rtse bar byed de de ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du'ang byed do//de nas
174a6(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na de'ang yid dga' bar gyur nas rang gi khyim nas 'byung zhing byung nas sems shing bdag cag la 'di dang 'di skad ces zer bas ma l-i bdag cag yul
174a7(mdo sde): gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes zer ba lta bu dag ni tshul khrims mtshungs pa zhes bya ba yin te/de lta bu de dag ni mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag la dga' bar mi 'gyur/mdo sde 'di
174b1(mdo sde): lta bu 'di dag klog pa dang /gzhan la'ang ston pa dang /gzhan dag sbyong bar byed pa de lta bu gnas pa dang /de ltar sbyong bar byed pa de dag la phyogs par mi 'gyur ro//de
174b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/de 'dra ba'i dus la ni sems can rnams chos kyis phongs por 'gyur bas bcom pa'i yid kyis lhod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de nas de'i tshe gang dang gang
174b3(mdo sde): du bskol pa 'dra ba'i spyod pa de dang der dong nas skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o dus ngan pa'i dus 'byung bar 'gyur lags so//bka' stsal pa/
174b4(mdo sde): 'od srung de 'dra ba'i dus byung ba na phan par ston pa rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang /ji lta bu'i rang bzhin du bya zhe na/dper na grong rdal lam/grong khyer ram/tshong 'dus kyi lam
174b5(mdo sde): po che la brten pa'i zhing glang po che dang /rta dang /mis bza' bar 'os pa'i mon sran sde'u dang /mon srin gre'u dang /bu ram shing gi zhing lo tog phun sum tshogs pa zhig
174b6(mdo sde): yod par gyur la/de'ang gzan khar bab pas de'i dbus su lam po che 'byung la/de nas der khyim mi zhing bdag gis srung ma zhig bzhag pa dang /de nas des nyi ma gcig
174b7(mdo sde): bsrungs nas bag cha ste g.yel bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bcu pa dang /nyi shu pa dang /brgya pa'ang de bzhin no//de la mi tha ma shos
175a1(mdo sde): kyis bsams pa/gul te bdag gis 'di dag thams cad phyir bzlog na de nyid kyis bdag gis zhing bsrungs par mi 'gyur ba dang /lo tog kyang gru
175a2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur bas bdag gis thabs legs pa gang gis bdag zhing srung du 'gyur ba/zhing gi lo tog rgyud gzon par zhugs pa rnams la thabs legs pa zhig bsamapar
175a3(mdo sde): bya'o snyam zhing de nas des de ltar bsams nas/des grang na mon sran tsam mam/mon sman sne'u 'am/mon sran gre'u 'am/rgya sran yod pa de las de thog mar 'dron pa rnams
175a4(mdo sde): lelo gus pas bsu nas phu nu po bdag gi 'di snoms shig ces smra zhing sbyin pa byed na de ltar byin zhing de ltar smras pas zhing de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//'od srung khyod
175a5(mdo sde): kyis kyang de bzhin du nga 'das pa'i 'og tu thabs de lta bu byos la mdo 'di phyungs shig/'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam grangs 'dis skyes bu tha sha
175a6(mdo sde): rnams yang dag par gzung rngo mi thog lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bskal pa brgya stong du ri'i rgyal po ri rab khur du thogs pa ni mi ma lags kyi/skyes
175a7(mdo sde): bu tha shal tshul khrims 'chal pa dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa/dam pa'i chos la smod pa'i sems can dag gi tshig rtsub mo nyan po ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
175b1(mdo sde): 'das gzhan gyi sug par mchis te/dbang du bgyis pa ni mi mdo lags kyi/skyes bu tha shal tshul khrims 'chal pa can dam pa'i chos las kha phyir phyogs pa/dam pa'i chos las
175b2(mdo sde): ri du gyur pa/dam pa'i chos mnyan pa ma bzung bas nyams pa'i rgyud can gyi sems can de dag gi tshig rtsub po dang /rang bzhin ngan pa'i ngag dang /tshig mnyan pa ni ma lags
175b3(mdo sde): s+ho//bcom ldan 'das sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho dang /ri dang bcas par bskal pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong mang por spyi bor thogs pa ni mi mdo lags kyi/skyes bu thA shal tshul
175b4(mdo sde): khrims 'chal pa bstan pa rab tu rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa'i sems can de dag gi tshig rtsub po nyan pa ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
175b5(mdo sde): 'das 'on pa nyid dang /lkug pa nyid dang /dmus long nyid ni mi mdo lags kyi/skyes bu tha shal tshul khrims 'chal pa mu ge'i tshe 'tsho ba'i phyir mgo bregs shing ngur smrig
175b6(mdo sde): bgos nas zas dang /skom lhur bgyid pa'i sems can de dag gi tshig rtsub po nyan po ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ni mi mang
175b7(mdo sde): lags kyi/skyes bu tha shal tshul khrims 'chal pa lung bong ltar kun tu spyod pa/lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang /ngag gi tshul 'chos pa'i sems can dag gi tshig rtsub po dang

176a2(mdo sde): ram/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin pa yin nam/bcom ldan 'das gang zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang skye bar mi 'gyur zhing 'gum par mi
176a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyi lam ni theg pa gsum lags te/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
176a4(mdo sde): kyi lags so//'od srung gis yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags
176a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/'od srung nyan thos rnams nyan thos kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar

176a7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das na'ang /don ji srid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog deng ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes theg pa chen po'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
176b1(mdo sde): mchog gi mthar ma phyin gyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin no//bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

176b3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/nyon mongs pa'i lhag ma yod pas so//mar sar ltar ni nyan thos rnams so//mar sArA bsgongs pa ltar ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so//
176b4(mdo sde): mar gyi snying khu ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su blta bar bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i slad du theg pa gsum bstan lags/bcom
176b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dper na dmag mi'i mchog sgyu ma la mkhas pa zhig rang gi yul nas yul gzhan du chas pa na/de'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang ded cing skye bo'i tshogs
176b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang ded nas rnam pa mang po bsgral bar 'dod par gyur lo/de ni 'dron pa phal po che'i de'i ston pa yin zhing de nyid ded dpon yang yin pas de 'dron pa de rnams 'brog dgon
176b7(mdo sde): pa de nas grol ba na de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir sprul pa'i grong khyer rwa ba dang /khyams dang /yang thog phun sum tshogs pa zhig mngon par sprul nas mdzub mos rgyang ring po
177a1(mdo sde): nas bstan te/'di skad ces phyogs po dgra'u bu cag glang du 'dong ba'i grong khyer ni pha ba yin no zhes smras pa dang /de nas de dag nye bar gyur to sgyu ma
177a2(mdo sde): du bsams nas grong rdal lam/grong khyer ram/tshong 'dus de ni nye'o//de ni rten du 'gyur ro snyam du shes nas dbugs mchog tu phyin par 'gyur ro//de nas de dag
177a3(mdo sde): grong khyer der zhugs pa na bde ba dang ldan pas sems las chung ngur gyur cing yang grang du 'gro bar sems bskyed par mi byed do//de nas ston pa de 'di snyam du sems te//

177a6(mdo sde): ston pa des de dag las thos nas 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu dag grong khyer 'dri ni khyed cag ngal sor gzhug pa'i phyir kho bos sbrul gyis grong khyer chen po
177a7(mdo sde): mchog tu bdag cag gnas dgos te/grong khyer gzhan gang na ba der dong ngo //de dag gis kyang bdag cag 'tha' 'khob kyi grong khyer phal par gnas pa 'di ci rung
177b1(mdo sde): de ltar bya'o zhes smras pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o//yang grong khyer chen po zhig sprul te der yang de kho na bzhin no//de nas ston pa de dag 'brog dgon pa de nas de
177b2(mdo sde): ltar sgrol zhing de ltar dbugs 'byin pa na grong khyer der btsud do//de nas de dag grong khyer der zhugs pa na 'di snyam du sems te/cig grong khyer 'di'i pha rol na ches khyad par

177b5(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i grong khyer gzhan med do//de nas 'dron pa de dag ded dpon de'i tshig la yid ches par byas na de dag gis grong khyer gyi yon tan gyi khyad par gong nas gong du thos
177b6(mdo sde): shing mthong ba dang ston pa de las 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po bdag cag thams cad kyang lhan cig tu grong khyer thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa'i grong khyer chen po gang

178a1(mdo sde): de nas sgrol ba na/skye ba'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu dag nga ni khyed kyis blong khyer chen po de'i snga ltas dang /grong khyer chen

179a1(mdo sde): theg pa gsum du gtam rnam pa gsum ston cing mya ngan lngas 'das pa'ang rnam pa gsum du skyon la thog pa gcig kyang ston par mdzad do//'od srung

179a4(mdo sde): ba can du rig par bya la/bla na med pa'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di dag ni dgongs pa can ma yin par rig par bya'o//'od srung gzhan yang 'di lta ste ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
179a5(mdo sde): rgyal gyi dgun zla tha chung ste/gang gi tshe dgun zla tha chung la bab pa de'i tshe rgyal pos shi ba dang /bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /rigs sna

179b1(mdo sde): cad la de thams cad byin te/de la kha cig ni thams cad bsgos pa'i zas za/kha cig ni mon sran gre'u 'am/mon sran sne'u 'am/na le shram dag gi bar re re'i ro bsgrubs/

179b3(mdo sde): zer zhing de na tshugs drod du za ba'i zas zhim po gang yin pa de sdug pa'i bu 'am/skyes pa 'am/grong mi 'am/rang gi skye bo 'am/gzhan dag la byin pa de bzhin du 'od srung
