416b4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
416b5(mdo sde): pa chen po de na dpal lha mo chen mo chos nyan pa'i phyir//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/de nas dpal lha mo chen mo stan las langs te/bcom ldan
416b6(mdo sde): 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo bsgyur ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi bre'i
416b7(mdo sde): dngos po'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar mi bgyid pa dag mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di na
417a1(mdo sde): sems can bsod nams su gdags pa dang bral ba dag phal che lags te/rgyu de dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dir sems
417a2(mdo sde): can rnams la snying rje chen po dgra bskyed par bgyid lags so//'di ni sems can rnams gang gis na rgyu ma mchis par smra zhing longs spyod dang bral la/tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing
417a3(mdo sde): nyams thag pa dang /don ma mchis par 'bad pa de dag ni sbyin pa rnam par bged pa ma mchis par yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog ste/de lta bas na bdag cig gis sbyin
417a4(mdo sde): ba'i go bgos te/brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi zhing /'di ltar bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes byang chub sems dpo'
417a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kun tu sbyor bar bgyi bo'i dngos pos//sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bla na ma mchis pa la 'jug par
417a6(mdo sde): bgyid pa nas chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma mchis par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can rtag par smra ba 'di dag ldongs
417a7(mdo sde): spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa rgya chen po dang bral la tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dag mchis te/de dag tshul khrims rnam par bged pa ma mchis par yongs su smin par bgyid

417b7(mdo sde): rngo mi thog pas sems can phra ma dang /tshig rtsub po dang /chags sems dang /gnod sems kun tu spyod cing /'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa spyod pa de dag la byang chub

422b1(mdo sde): la byed pa de lta bu dag gis gnas pa nas yul 'khor de lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro//yul 'khor de klu'i dbang po dang /gnod sbyin gyi
422b2(mdo sde): dbang po dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /yi dgas kyi dbang po dang /sha za'i dbang po
422b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro//de na ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas drug 'khod pa'i bar du'o//yul 'khor de'i rgyal po'ang yid dang 'thad
422b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos bcu thob par 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/nad med pa dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bo dang /tshe ring ba dang /gzugs bzang ba dang /mdog bzang po dang ldan pa dang /
422b5(mdo sde): yan lag dang nying lag sdug pa dang /'khor skye bo bzad pa dang /las kyi mtha' legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang /byams pa dang snying rje la sbyor ba dang /snyan par grags pa dag ste/
422b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas snod du gyur pa/mtho ris su 'gro ba'i yul 'khor de ni yon tan dang /phan yon chen po bcu po dag gis rgyas par 'gyur ro//
422b7(mdo sde): rang gi dpung dang /gzhan gyi dpung dang /chom rkun dang /mi rgod dang /ri dgas dang /stag dang /sbrang ma dang /sha sbrang dang /phye ma leb dang char ches pa dang /thon ches pa dang /dus
423a1(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i rlung dang /lhags pa dang /nyi mas gdungs pa dang /tsha ba'i reg pa dag gis gnod par mi 'gyur ro//yul 'khor de sa gni mnyam ste/dgon
423a2(mdo sde): pa dang gcong rong med do//tsha ba dang khro ba med do//de nas bon sna tshogs dag 'phel lo//'bru dang /spyan dang /rtswa dang /shrIng dang /shing ljon pa dang /chu dag phun sum
423a3(mdo sde): tshogs shing chung mi za ba 'byung ngo //de ni me tog dang /sman dang /'bru dang /ro rnams chud mi za bar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//yul 'khor dedang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra dang /
423a4(mdo sde): byi dgra dang /nang 'khrug gi dpung dag dang /lo nyes dang /nad dang /dus ma yin pa'i nad dang /'chi ba dag mi 'byung ngo //de nas sems can rnams tshe ring zhing kha dog dang ldan no//
423a5(mdo sde): bde ba mang zhing sems la rnyog ma med do//rtse dga' dang mtshungs par ldan zhing chos spyod la mtho ris dag la gzhol lo//yul 'khor de ni sbyin gnas snod du gyur pa dag
423a6(mdo sde): rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang mthun par mngon par dga' ba dang bcas paste gnas so//de nas bza' btung gi ljongs spyod ma tshad med do//'byung ba chen po yid du 'ong ba
423a7(mdo sde): dag gis brtan to//dbang po dang /khams dag rgyas shing mi mthun pa med do//yul 'khor de na mi rnams dpa' zhing dran po dang ldan la/byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan zhing
423b1(mdo sde): mtho ris dag la gzhol lo//dpal cho ga shes yul 'khor de chos bcu po de dag gis legs par brgyan pa yin no//dpal cho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi
423b2(mdo sde): sgrib pa ni 'di yin te/theg pa chen po gtong ba dang /slu zhing nyan thos kyi sa la 'jog par byed pa'o//sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi bsam
423b3(mdo sde): gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni de lta bu yin no//nyan thos gang dag gi bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs por mi shes pa de dag ni khams
423b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi btson ra'i gnas kyi yan lag lnga ma spangs shing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yin no//gang dag khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa/mi slob pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa/
423b5(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas rnam par rtse ba/mngon par shes pa pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/bskal pas nges par 'byung ba/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi
423b6(mdo sde): zhal nas skyes pa/chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi sprul pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ongs dag la mchod pa dang /bkur sti bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
423b7(mdo sde): dag tu 'gro bar yang mi nus la sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi lam gsum po dag kyang bskam par mi nus so//gang na nyan thos bsam gtan gyi rnam par rtse ba mngon
424a1(mdo sde): /nga shes pa dag ni de lta bu yin la/yul 'khor de'i yon tan dang phan yon ni de lta bu yin to//sngar ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o//'dus pa chen po theg bachen par
424a2(mdo sde): mdo bco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las nyan thos mtshon pa ste dang po rdzogs s+ho///dal cho ga shes de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
424a3(mdo sde): dang /nyan thos dang /rang rgyal thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba thun mong du gzhag pa dang /gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
424a4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma lnga po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed ce n+tu/dpal cho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung
424a5(mdo sde): ba thams cad du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba dang /'jig pa la rtog par byed de/des na sred pa dang /chags pa dag skems par yang
424a6(mdo sde): byed la nges pa la 'jug par yang mi byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa 'ang yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa
424a7(mdo sde): dngong /bkur sti bya ba dang /dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba las mkhas pa'ang yin no//sems can rnams kyi la
424b1(mdo sde): gsum po las kyi lam dang /nyon mongs pa'i lam dang /sdug bsngal gyi lam drug skems pa bang byed do//spyod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar yang byed la/'dod du
424b2(mdo sde): khams dag gtong bar yang mi byed do//sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba sna tshugs kyi skye ba'i sna drug smon par yang byed la/mngam rgya nyas pas gos
424b3(mdo sde): par yang mi byud //sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba gcod par yid byed la/sems can rnams dmyigs par yang mi byed ngo //dpal tshig shes 'di la byang chub sems
424b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba phan tshun mi 'dra ba la ji lta ba bzhin rtog par yang byed lo//'phral 'phral du de shes paro yang mi byed do//
424b5(mdo sde): dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba'i gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'jushes dang /'du byed/sa dang /de bzhin du dbugs rdib pa dang /dbugs 'byung
424b6(mdo sde): ba'i rnam par shes pa nye bar len po'i phung po dag la ji lta ba bzhin du 'ang rab tu shes shing dbugs rngub pa 'ang gzhan lo/dbugs 'byung ba 'ang gzhan no//dbugs rdzob pa sas
424b7(mdo sde): yang dge bar rig pa'ang gzhan la/dbugs 'byung ba so sa yang dag par rig pa'ang gzhan no//dbugs rngub pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /sems pa yid la byed pa'ang gzhan/
425a1(mdo sde): la dbugs 'byung ba'i tshod pa dang /'du shes dang /sems pa yid la byed pa 'ang gzhan no//dbugs rngub pa'i sems pa'ang gzhan la dbugs 'byung ba 'dug na
425a2(mdo sde): no//gang gi tshe dbugs rngub pa so so yang dag par rig pa de'i tshe dbugs 'byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa ma yin no//gang gi tshe dbugs 'byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa de'i
425a3(mdo sde): tshe dbugs rngub pa so so yang dag par rig pa ma yin no//'khor ba'i 'khor lo dum bu gsum par tshor pa dang /'du shes dang /sems pa yid la byed pa'ang de lta bu yin te/'jug
425a4(mdo sde): pa'i rgyus na bar chad med par skye ba'i rgya mtshor bangs shing thar par yang mi byed do//yang dang yang skye bar byed do//rga bar byed do//'chi bar byed do//yang skye bar yang byed do//chos
425a5(mdo sde): gang 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa des na rga shi las nges par 'byung ba dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so//de dag dbug so rngub pa dang /dbugs
425a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin nye bar rtog par mi byed do//'di ltar srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo dag gi dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba 'jug pa dang /nges par
425a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar yang byed do//de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu'i sgo 'bum phrag khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba 'jug pa
425b1(mdo sde): dang /nges par 'byung bar byed kyang ba spu'i khung bu'i sgo 'bum phrag khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu de dag nyams par yang mi mngon no//rgyas par yang mi mngon no//sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi
425b2(mdo sde): ma'i mtha' dang /thog ma dang /bar ma dang /tha ma 'ang mi mngon no//'jug pa dang 'byung ba'ang mi mngon no//de 'di snyam du bdag gis ci nas kyang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa
425b3(mdo sde): dang /dbugs 'byung ba de la skye ba dang /'jig pa'i tshul gyis skye 'jig gi mtshan nyid la brtson pa dang ldan par gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
425b4(mdo sde): chen po de rma'i sgo dgu'i dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang /'jig pa la sbyor zhing so sor rtog par byed do//de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu'i sgo 'bum phrag khrag khrig dgu
425b5(mdo sde): bcu rtsa dgu snyed re re'i ba spu'i khung bu'i dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang /'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la brtson pa dang ldan par gnas par byed do//yang na de ba spu'i khung bu'i
425b6(mdo sde): sgo sgra'i nya ga ma tsam du chung bar rtog na'ang dar dbugs rngub pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba rgyu ba de dag chung bar yang mthong ngo //yang che bar rtog na'ang yungs 'bru chen po tsam du yang dag par
425b7(mdo sde): /rjes su mthong ngo //yang na skyu ru ra tsam du rtog na'ang skyu ru ra tsam du mthong ngo //yang na be spu'i khung bu re re la bil+la'i 'bras bu tsam du rtog na'ang bil+la'i 'bras bu tsam du mthong ngo //yang na
426a1(mdo sde): mamamams sa mamaHsa mtham/a ma.aHthas mtha.a ma mayatham mamamam
426a2(mdo sde): dpag tshad stong tsam du rtog na'ang dpag tshad skyong tsam du mthong ngo //yang na gling bzhi pa gcig tsam du rtog nu'ang gling bzhi pa gcig tsam du mthong ngo //yang na
426a3(mdo sde): ba spu'i khung bu re re la rgya che bar rtog na'ang rgya che bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //de bzhin du mig gi tshad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o//gang du rga shi dang 'breng ba'i sems can dag
426a4(mdo sde): par tshad med par 'khor ba'i chu bor bangs pas sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong ba na/de 'di snyam du bdag gis ci nas kyang rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi
426a5(mdo sde): 'du shes dag dor bar bya'o snyam du sems te/de rlung gi khams la sems nye bar gtod par byed do//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes dag spong bas des brjod du
426a6(mdo sde): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob ste/de ni nyan thos dang /rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi snga ma yin no//de la sa'i khams mi dmigs so//chu'i khams mi dmigs so//me'i
426a7(mdo sde): khams mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//phung po dang /khams dang /
426a8(mdo sde): skye mched rnams rgyu ba mi dmigs so//sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so//phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so//'jig rten 'di mi dmigs so//'jig rten pha rol mi dmigs so//
426b1(mdo sde): legs par spyad pa dang /nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so//skye ba mi dmigs so//'jig pa mi dmigs so//kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dmigs so//
426b2(mdo sde): rnam par byung po mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de zhi ba la gnas pa de dag gis gnas so//gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
426b3(mdo sde): 'dis bskol pa tshad med par byin gyis rlab par 'dod nu'ang /de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byin gyis rlob po//de chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis
426b4(mdo sde): bskul pa tshad med par gnas par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du gnas par byed do//'di ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
426b5(mdo sde): dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po bzhin no//dpal tshig shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grong gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod
426b6(mdo sde): du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dbang thob par gyur pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gang gi tshe ting nge 'dzin 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa de'i tshe/des dang
426b7(mdo sde): po kho nar sems can yongs su smon par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams dang /shes rab kyi stobs kyis smon lam 'di lta bur 'debs par byed de/'di ltar bdag yun ji srid du ting
427a1(mdo sde): 'dzin las ma langs pa de srid kyi bar du yul 'di nyid dang /glang bzhi pa 'di nyid ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i bar gyi
427a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa dang /yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag phun sum tshogs par gyur cig 'di lta ste/de na sems can rnams kyi gnas dang /
427a3(mdo sde): lus dang /lus kyi dbyibs mdog dang /yan log dang /nying ldog dang /rgyun dang /lhab lhub dang /phyang phrul dang /phreng ba dang /mal cha dang /gos dang /bza' ba dang /
427a4(mdo sde): btung ba dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg pa yid du 'ong ba ci dang ci 'dod pa dang /ji lta bu zhig 'dod pa dang /ji snyed cig 'dod pa rnams 'byung bar gyur cig ces
427a5(mdo sde): smon lam btab nas/de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin de la 'jug par byed do//ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
427a6(mdo sde): chen po de ji srid du snyoms par zhugs pa de srid kyi bar du de na sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /yo byad de lta bu dag 'byung ba ni sngar ji skad gsungs pa yin no//gzhan
427a7(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de smon lam 'di lta bur 'debs par byed de/'di ltar bdag yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du
427b1(mdo sde): tshad bzung ste/sems can rnams kyi lus kyi nad rlung las gyur pa dang /mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /bud kan las gyur pa dang /'dus pa las gyur pa dang /de bzhin du sems kyi nang
427b2(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug la sogs pa dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnod pa las 'byung ba'i nad dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/dge ba bcu'i
427b3(mdo sde): las kyi lam dag la gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam btab nus/de'i rjes la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di ltar yun ji srid
427b4(mdo sde): du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du tshad bzung ba'i sems can rnams kyi lus dang /sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi nang de lta bu dag rab tu zhi bar byed do//gzhan yang byang
427b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam 'di lta bu 'debs par byed de/bdag yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan par gnas pa de srid kyi bar du sems can dmyal
427b6(mdo sde): ba rnams dang /dud 'gro rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdol bsngal dang /bkres pa dang /skom pa dang /tsha ba dang /grang ba dang /mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang /sdug pa dang
427b7(mdo sde): bral ba dang /dal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /tshol khro'i sdug bsngal dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams brtson 'grus
428a1(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur cig/dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral ba rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la brtson par gyur cig/yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu
428a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams sems can gzhan dag la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /mi 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan
428a3(mdo sde): pa dang /'khon med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /bsam gtan
428a4(mdo sde): gyi sems dang ldan pa dang /snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas par gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /'khrul pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ji srid du ting nge 'dzin
428a5(mdo sde): de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bur du sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi mun pa dang /rtag pa dang chad par lta ba dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/dus thams cad du lta bar 'dzin pa
428a6(mdo sde): rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la blo 'jug cing zhes dang ri mo byed par
428a7(mdo sde): gyur cig/phyin ci log bzhi dang /bral zhing bdeni pa bzhi'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/'phags pa don dam pa'i bden pa la rnam par gnas pa'i
428b1(mdo sde): sems dang ldan par gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa de'i tshe/'di ltar shes rab
428b2(mdo sde): dang /bsod nams kyi stobs dang /thabs kyi stobs kyis 'di lta bur byin gyis rlob par byed de/bdag yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin las ma langs pa de sbrid kyi bar du yul 'di nyid dang /gling
428b3(mdo sde): bzhi pa 'di nyid ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i bar dag ji ltar tshad bzung ba rnams la 'di ltar bde bar sbyar bar byin gyis rlob par byed do//de'i rjes
428b4(mdo sde): la chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la 'jug par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa des ji ltar sems can
428b5(mdo sde): rnams tshad bzung ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis bde bar sbyar ba yon tan sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/
428b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'i chen po dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las de srid du ldang bar mi byed do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
428b7(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs pa de'i lus la gnod pa dang 'gyur ba mi 'byung ngo //bkres pa dang skom pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //me'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //bskal pa'i mes tshig par mi 'gyur
429a1(mdo sde): ba nas me phal bas tshig par mi 'gyur ro//chus khyer bar mi 'gyur ro//nad kyi bskal bas zad par mi 'gyur ro//mu ges dgon par gyur pa'i bskal pas
429a2(mdo sde): zad par mi 'gyur ro//bsam bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba las ma gtogs par tshe'i 'du byed dang /srog gi dbang po yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro//lus dang /srog la mi dang /
429a3(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa dang /rlung dang /nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis gnod par mi 'gyur te/de lta bu ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin no//ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas kyang 'dod na skra'i rtse mo
429a4(mdo sde): gcig gis nang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dgra gzhug par nuso//'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'
429a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad gcig tu bsdom pa ma lus pa dag sor mo gcig gi sen mo'i nang du blta bar yang nus so//'dod na skra'i rtse mo gcig gi nang du
429a6(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med pa thams cad grazhug par yang nus le/de na de sems can re re'i rang rang gi yul dang /spyod yul dag yangs par yang mthong ngo //'dod na sangs
429a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi rlung gi khams thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig gi nang du bcug ste der nam mkha'i gtos yangs pa bzhin du spyod par byed kyang de che bar
429b1(mdo sde): yang mi mngon no//chung bar yang mi mngon no//'dod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi chu'i khams thams cad mon sran sde'u'i 'brum
429b2(mdo sde): bu gcig gi nang du bcug ste/der nam mkha'i gtos yongs pa bzhin du spyod par byed kyang de che bar yang mi mngon no//chung bar yang mi mngon no//byang chub sems dpa' de rang gi smon
429b3(mdo sde): lam gyi stobs ma gtogs par yang dang yang mngal gyi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro//bud med du mi 'gyur ro//skye ba dman pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//
429b4(mdo sde): yan lag nyams par mi 'gyur ro//lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi spyod pa la 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro//sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rong gi smon lam gyi stobs ma gtogs
429b5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de rtag par sangs rgyas blta ba dang /chos mnyan pa dang /dge 'dun la bkur sti bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin no//de shes
429b6(mdo sde): rab dang /bsod nams dang ting nge 'dzin dang /thabs mkhas pa dag gis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa'i brla la 'jigs pa
429b7(mdo sde): med pa dang ma bral ba yin no//dpal cho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyong
430a1(mdo sde): zhing slob pa na 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes par byed do//yan lag lnga dang
430a2(mdo sde): ldan zhing yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa yin no//de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po bzhis rtse ba mngon par shes pa yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la
430a3(mdo sde): mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba dang /dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la mkhas pa yin no//gang gis na
430a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi lam gsum po las kyi lam dang /nyon mongs pa'i lam dang /sdug bsngal gyi lam ngag skems par byed pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' de ltar
430a5(mdo sde): skems par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de bzhin du de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing myur du bla
430a6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
430a7(mdo sde): par bstan pa na/'khor de ni sems can lnga khri bo gang dag gis sngon chos bzhi po 'di dag goms par byas pa de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang ldan
430b1(mdo sde): den srog chags brgya khA bani stong dag gis ni dpa' bar 'gro bya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur to//de nas drog chags khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag gis na
430b2(mdo sde): bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu thob par gyur te//de na sems can sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag gi
430b3(mdo sde): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//'dus pa chen po theg pa chen
430b4(mdo sde): po'i mdo bcwo lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las bsam gtan mtshon pa ste gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho///de nas de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
430b5(mdo sde): snying pos dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces smras so//dbul chog shes gling chen po bzhi pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis yun ring por
430b6(mdo sde): shin tu marjod pa cher byu ba dang /rjes su bsrung bar bya ba dang /rjes su dran par bye ba dang /phyag bya bar thos pa dag ji rnam pa ning ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
430b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po de lta bu dag bsdus pa dang /byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag la
431a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ba'i sa rab tu bsgrags pa de lta bu dag ltos
431a2(mdo sde): shig/khyod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag la yang dag par mngon du zhon nas khyod kyis sbyin gnas de lta bu dag la bza' ba dang //
431a3(mdo sde): btung ba'i yo byad dag 'byor par byas pa yin te/khyod brtson pa des na myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
431a4(mdo sde): la gnas par byed dam de la dpal lha mo chen mos 'di skad ces smras so//skyes bu chen po dam pas ji skad smras pa de ltar lags te/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskul pa dpag
431a5(mdo sde): tu med pa dag 'odas pa na gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegaso pa shAkya thub pa de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/'di ltar bdag dang gcig la gcig de tshig bcas
431a6(mdo sde): pa gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba de'i tshe/bdag gling chen po bzhi pa der dpal chen mo'i go 'phang thob par shog cig
431a7(mdo sde): pa dang /de na sems can rnams la bza' ba dang /btung ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin pa byed par 'gyur bar bgyis lags so//rigs kyi bu khyod bdag las gson cig dang /
431b1(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa gang de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan
431b2(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to//skye dgu'i tshe lo stong zhes bye ba nas de'i tshe de'i dus na dge bsnyen skar ma dri med dpal zhes bya ba dul ba/gsal ba/'jigs pa med pa/thos
431b3(mdo sde): pa mang ba/'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston po/'khor mang ba/'khor phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung bar gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/de'i bu thu bo dri med dpal zhes bya ba zhig byung
431b4(mdo sde): ba des rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa//yab cig ci slad rang gi lus srog btang nas kyang //zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson zhing rtsol bar mdzad//yab cig tsha
431b5(mdo sde): 'dis mya ngan 'das par mi gshegs par//sems can rnams la mchog tu srung mdzad shin tu brtson//des rang gi bu dri med dpal la tshigs su bcad pas lan smras pa/sems can
431b6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rmongs pa dang //lam ngan zhugs shing nyon mongs pa yi me 'bar ba//rtag tu sdug bsngal dag gis nyon mongs ngas mthong nas//nyon mongs pa
431b7(mdo sde): yi me dag gsad phyir de brtson byed//shes rab rnam par nyams shing mtha' las 'das pa dang /lam las rab tu nyams shing ngan song 'gro ba dang //'khor ba shin tu bzod rlag chu bor
432a1(mdo sde): /ltung ba rnams//rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir ni nga yang spyod par byed//sbyin da ngul dang sdom pa rnam par spangs pa dang //lha dang mi yi bde las rtag tu nyams pad/
432a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag dang rtag tu bral ba rnams//de dag la ni bdag gis lam ston 'gyur bar bya//sems can nyon mongs pa yis brtson rar rtag bcings pa//mgon
432a3(mdo sde): med gyur pa mig ni rnam par nya mos gyur cing //lce ngan dag la chags pa sha dang khrag zla ba//de dag dog par bya phyir du ni spyod par byed//sems can re re'i don du mnar
432a4(mdo sde): med spyod byed pa//dri 'dra'i snying rje'i sems can rnams la bskyed par bya//ji ltar sems can re rI'i de dag zer bya'i phyir//sdug bsngal bzod rlag bzod dka' bdag gi
432a5(mdo sde): dang du blang //bu cig nga yis byang chub spyod mchog spyad par bya//nyan thos dag gi shes pa btsal bar mi bya zhing //rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'ang btsal bar mi bya ste//bla na ma
432a6(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes dag ni btsal bar bya//ji srid gad+hI'i byi snyed sems can du mdag/sdug bsngal dag las thar par byas par mA gyur par//de srid byang chub mchog rab 'di
432a7(mdo sde): 'tshang mi rgya//phyi nas byang chub mchog rab de la rig par bya//bu cig phyed kyis sems can rnams la mtshungs par ni//snying rje 'di lta bu dag bskyed par byas nas kyang //khyod
432b1(mdo sde): kyis dge dang rtag tu ldan par byas pa rnams//byang chub mchog pa ga /bdag tu bsngo bar gyis//sems can nyon mongs me lus rab tu thar bya'i phyir//sdug bsngal bzod drug bzlod
432b2(mdo sde): dga' ba dgra dang du long //sbyin drang dul dang sdom pa dag la legs spyod cing //rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba 'di ni the tshom med//gang tshe de ni byang chub mchog ma thob pa ni//
432b3(mdo sde): de tshe khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sbyin por 'gyur//de yis khyod ni byang chub mchog tu lung bstan nas//'di la dam bcas brtan por legs par gnas pa yin/rigs kyi bu
432b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe bdag gis de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mchin rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'di lta bur dam bcas te//bdag yun ji srid du 'khor ba na 'khor ba de srid kyi bar
432b5(mdo sde): du brtul zhugs dang /dka' thub dang /dka' ba spyad pa dang /sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /sdom pa dang /bsam gratAn dang /zlos pa dang /gtong ba dang zhal ta sna tshogs dag
432b6(mdo sde): lA grims par bgyi'o//dka' ba spyad pa dang /yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag la goms par bgyi'o//gang gi tshe skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa'i tshe nyon mongs pa dang /nyon mongs
432b7(mdo sde): pa'i rnyog pa dag gis kun tu rmongs par gyur pa'i zhing dag tu bdag gi pha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pararo 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i zhing der/
433a1(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang dpal gyi go 'phang gi bdag pa bla na med pa dag bstan par bgyi'o//de'i bstan pa la bza' bya dang /btung ba'i yo byad blu na med pa'i
433a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa por 'gyur bar bgyi'o//de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag la bdag gis zhal zas dang /btung ba sna tshogs dag gis rim gro bgyi'o//der de
433a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon sum du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par bgyi'o//der sems can gang dag ma rungs pa/rtsub pa/
433a4(mdo sde): snying mi brtse ba/byas pa mi gzo ba/mi mnyam pa/yang bar spyod pa/sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis dus ma yin pa'i rdzi char dang /tsha ba dang /grang
433a5(mdo sde): ba dang /char mo che dag 'bebs par byed pas gang dag sems can rnams kyi 'bru dang /'bras bu dang /lo tog dang /sman dang /ljon shing dang /ro dag ma rung bar byed pa/madrangs
433a6(mdo sde): 'phrog pa/sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa dag chung gzon par byed pa/mun gnag tu byed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bsod nams kyi mthu dang shes
433a7(mdo sde): rab kyi stobs kyis bzlog par bgyi'o//dong par bgyi'o///'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde//bam po gnyis pa//gang gi tshe sems can de dag longs spyodapa
433b1(mdo sde): nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas sems can de dag mi dge ba bcu la spyod par byed do//dge bcu'i chos rnams yongs su nyams par byed do//'di ltar de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gdul bya rnams
433b2(mdo sde): bstan po dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /yo byad dog dang mi ldan pas grags pa med par 'gyur te/des nu der bdag gis ljongs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum
433b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa'i rgyu dag gis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyi'o//gang gi tshe 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar
433b4(mdo sde): smon lam btab pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de ltar bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/de'i tshe ji lhor smon lam
433b5(mdo sde): btab pa bzhin bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pas rigs kyi bu de ltar smon lam btab pa legs so legs so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal pos
433b6(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba yin no//rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag gis 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sbyin gyis//khyod kyis gzungs kyi snying po 'dis de lta bur
433b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams shin tu yongasu smin par byed nus som//sems can tshad med pa dag longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dag gis nyon mongs pa'i
434a1(mdo sde): /ma hA dza lAm+b+ha/a nu dza lam+b+ha/sarba dza lam+b+ha/oM gra dza lam+b+ha/yak+Sha b+hI dza lam+b+ha/nAg

434a3(mdo sde): bri dza lim+b+ha/ba mra ba mra/dza la ba mra/bi dza b+ha na dA/prAn+d+ha puSh+pa pha lam+b+ha/muk+ShAn ri b+hAn sa/d+harmA ya dz+nyA/briSh+Ti saM/hri lam+b+ha/sha shi stud la/gung gung sa ra gung /

434a6(mdo sde): so//mnos nus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag gis mchod pa dang rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag byas te/tshulo khrims dang /thos pa dang /brtul zhugs dag kyang
434a7(mdo sde): spyad do//de'i 'og tu'ang sangs rgyas khri snyed la de lta bu'i smon lam dag btab pa des ni bdag gis nga ltar bskal pa bzang po 'di la dpal chen po'i go 'phang thob pa yin//
434b1(mdo sde): da ltar bdag 'dir don chen po de lta bu bgyid pa'i tshe mi nyal pa de ci'i slad du zhe na/de tshun chad klu khro bo phal mo che dag byung ba dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /lha ma yin dang /grul
434b2(mdo sde): bum dang /yi dgas dang /sha za ma rungs pa rtsub pa/ma dad pa/snying rje med pa/snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa phal mo che dag lhogs pas srog chags su gyur pa rnams la

434b7(mdo sde): par byed do//de dag sa'i bcud rnams la dbugs gtong bar byed de/de dag gis sa'i bcud rnams skyon dang bcas pa dang /snyegs ma dang bcas pa dang /nang dang bcas pa dang /

435a7(mdo sde): g.yo can khar bros pas dkon mchog gsum la lus dang /ngag yid 'khrul par spyod pa yin no//sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tshul khrims 'chal pa sdom pa ma yin
435b1(mdo sde): pa la spyod pa de dag dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing yon tan gyis phyug pa/spobs bgrol ba dang ldan pa de dag gis spyod par byed do//da ltar 'di na sems can dag/gshe ba/

435b3(mdo sde): yod pa spangs pa dang /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /dge ba thams cad la spyod pa spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa da

435b7(mdo sde): son pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa'i chags thams cad kyi nang na rgyal mtshan gyi mchog tu gyur pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa yin pas nga khyod kyis gling
436a1(mdo sde): bzhi pa 'dir snying rje dang snying brtse ba dag skyed cag/gling bzhi pa 'di ni klu khro bo dag ji ltar bzlog par nus pa dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /lha
436a2(mdo sde): ma yin dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /shu za khro bo dang /lus srul po khro bo dag ji dag ji ltar bzlog par nus pa dang /de dag ci nas kyang dus su tshor 'bebs shing
436a3(mdo sde): chu 'byin par 'gyur ba dang /lo tog phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /tsha ba dang /grang ba dus su sbyor bar 'gyur ba dag blos rtogs shig dang /gzhi des sems
436a4(mdo sde): tsan+da rnams kyi longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa mi nyams la sa'i bcud thams cad la 'dra skyon med pa dang /nad med pa dang /snying po dang ldan pa dang /dran pa'i rgyu can dang /

436a6(mdo sde): ni nad med pa dang /dran pa dang ldan pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar ji skad gsungs pa yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos dpal
436a7(mdo sde): lha mo chen mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//dpal chog shes bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po ma lus pa dag lha'i bde bar sprul na
436b1(mdo sde): 'dir sems can rnams/bskal pa 'bum phrag snyed kyi bar du longs spyod par bya bar nus kyang /'dir sems can rnams kyis longs spyod par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
436b2(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams dang bral ba ste/longs spyod dang nye bar spyod po rgya chen po dag la longs spyod pa'i snod ma yin no//bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dri
436b3(mdo sde): thams cad lha'i gzhal med khang rgya chen por sprul pa dang /lho'i gnas ma la dang /rgyan dang /gos dang /lhab lhub dang /spos dang /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /'bras bu dang /shing
436b4(mdo sde): ljon pa dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /sil snyanA dang /glu dbyangs dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag tu sprul par nus kyang /'dir sems can de dag bsod nams dang bral bas
436b5(mdo sde): snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir longs spyod par mi nus te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
436b6(mdo sde): bcu pa de dag dang /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa dag longs spyad par spyod pa ni ma gtogs so//bdag gis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa drug bsam gtan
436b7(mdo sde): bzhi la snyoms par zhugs par gzhag par nus na/'di na klu khro bo zhes bya ba nas lus srul po khro bo zhes bya ba'i bar dag zhi bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgas/'di ltar bdag ni
437a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang bar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dag bstan pa ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/dpernyan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
437a2(mdo sde): pos ma gnang bar blon po rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dgra gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa shom pa de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/byang chub
437a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mA lus pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras thugs las skyes pa/gsung las skyes pa/chos las byung zhing
437a4(mdo sde): chos kyis sprul pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang bar rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bstan par ni sus kyang mi nus so//dpalo cho ga shes 'on kyang chu klung nor bu'i
437a5(mdo sde): gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rig sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig mdor bsdus pa dang /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de

437a7(mdo sde): zhus shig dang /da de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la chu klung nor bu'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rig sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig
437b1(mdo sde): mdor bsdus pa dag ston par 'gyur te/bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //khyod kyis kyang byasam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis shig/de nas dpal lha mo chen mo dang /

437b6(mdo sde): du gsol//chu klung rig sngags gsang sngags tshig rab mchog/thub pa rin po chu yis bstan du gsol//des na rnyog ldan klung dag dang 'gyur bas//sa yi bcud rnams slan

438a1(mdo sde): bstan du gsol//des na nad med dran dang ldan pa dang //dge ba dag la spyod par gyur nas kyang //rgyal ba'i bstan la lta ba ngan pa po//yang ba dag rnam pa ra/
438a2(mdo sde): spong bar 'gyur//rgyal bas bdag gi snying la mya ngan dang //nyon mongs sel bgyid mdangs ni 'grub pa dang //gang gis bdag ni sems can thams cad dag/yongs smin bgyid/

438b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can stong pa de na sems can rnams la 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dra rab tu ston par byed do//gzungs kyi rgyu des na der dus ma yin/

442b5(mdo sde): bu dang /klu rta lta bu dang /klu sbrul lta bu dang /klu nya lta bu dang /klu sbal pA lta bu de dag dus 'dir yang bsgrub par bgyid lags so//bdag gis 'jig rten snang bar byed pa zab mo
442b6(mdo sde): dag bstan pa na gang dag dus mi lags pa'i lhags pa dang /tsha ba dang /sprin dang /khug rna dang /TI char dang /char mo che dang /than chen dag 'byung bar bgyid pa/sems can rnams kyi

443a1(mdo sde): da ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na klu dang /klu chen po dang /klurI 'khor dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang /gling bzhi pa

443a5(mdo sde): nyan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i sems can de dag thams cad zas bzhi la rten cing 'tsho bar bgyid lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nga lha'i
443a6(mdo sde): dus su klu khro bo phung bar bgyid pa dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol/gang dag klu khro bo rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mngon par ma dad pas rtag par yang sgrub par bgyid pa/
443a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams la tho 'tsham pa sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang /nye bar longs spyod pa dag ma rungs par bgyid pa/'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba/sems can rnams
443b1(mdo sde): la skyid brtse ba ma mchis shing snying rje ma mchis par zhugs pa/sdang ba/rtsub pa lags te/bdag sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la bar chad bgyid pa lags pas/de dag gi don/
443b2(mdo sde): du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sdig pa de thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i
443b3(mdo sde): gnas na gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar klu yongs su smin
443b4(mdo sde): par brtson pas smon lam btab pa ci 'dra zhi na/sngon dang /da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi klu dang /klu chen po klu khro bo skye gnas bzhi pa dag dbugs gdug pa dang /klu rnams kyi
443b5(mdo sde): mig gdug pa dang /reg pa gdug pa dang /lce gdug pa dang /'dod chags kyi dug dang /zhe sdang gi dug dang /gti mug gi dug dang /klu khro bo rnams kyi sdig pa'i chos dag ci nas kyang
443b6(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pas bsal bar nus par bya'o//ci nas kyang klu khro bo de dag gis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa dang /yo byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams la
443b7(mdo sde): gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o//dkon mo chog gsum po de dag la dad pa dang /dga' ba thob par bya'o//da 'jig rten pha rol lo blta ba dang bcas shing sdig pa'i chos rnams dang
444a1(mdo sde): 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab po//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying pos bcom
444a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis glang da klu po de dog ni gnas der zhugs te mchis nas klu rnam par bsgyings pa'i
444a3(mdo sde): gnas zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas par bgyi lags so//de ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gis de dag gi khro ba dang /nga rgyal dang /dregs pa dang /
444a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags de dag nye bar zhi bar bgyi legs so//de dag 'jam pa dang /snod du rung ba dang /sems zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /sems 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar 'gyur ba dang /
444a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sems byams pa dang /snying rje ba dang /snying brtsi ba dang /sems brtse ba can du 'gyur bar bgyi legs so//klu khro bo dang /klu ma rungs pa rnams dang
444a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur bar bgyi lags so//sems can thams cad la mi 'chi zhing snying brtse ba can gyi sems kyi sa la gnas par bgyi lags so//gzhan yang gang dag rdzi chur dang
444a7(mdo sde): chang mo che dang /zan chen dang /sprin dang /sprin chen dang /lhags pa dang /tsha ba dag gis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/bdag gi ming
444b1(mdo sde): brjod nas 'di skad du ri'i snying po thugs rje rgyu che ba/klu yongs su sbyin par mdzad pa/bdag cag dran lags so//bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod par mdzad pa/thabs dang ye shes
444b2(mdo sde): snatshogs la brtson pas mi spyod lags sam/bdag drug sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad du gsol/yongs su bsgrub tu goso la zhes spro ba dag gis 'di skad du brjod par
444b3(mdo sde): gyi'o//t+yAd+h+ya thA/s+thAm b+ha b+hU dzaM/bi re Du b+hU dza/go b+hU bI rI dzI b+hUdz+dza/me ru b+hU dza/ga tu ba d+h+waM dz+nyAM/hUM hUM/a ne ba b+hU dzAM/s+phAr b+hu dza/s+phA re u bar+t+ta d+hA dz+nyA/ni maM b+hi b+hUdz+dza swA hA/
444b4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang kha cig klu khro bo dI drug gi rgyus gnod bu dag gis gnod pa bgyis par gyur pa de lta bu de dag gis ming nas brjod par bgyi zhing /
444b5(mdo sde): bya/nga rgyal can/dregs pa/phrag dog dang /'dod chags kyi sems zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du gsang sngags 'don pa na bdag gis lha'i rna ba rnam par dge pa mi las 'das pas/
444b6(mdo sde): bos naste smre gnas bzhi pa'i klu dang /klu chen po dang /glu rgan po dang /klu'i bu kyi po rnaM sa dang par ma bgyis sam/dus ma lags par don ched yang ba la zhugs pa dag
444b7(mdo sde): ma bzlog gam/de'i tshe dus ma legs pa'i char mo che nga /zin chen po dang /dus ma legs pa'i lhags pa dang /tsha ba dang /rlung dang /sprin dang /'khrug po dag ra tu
445a1(mdo sde): zhi bar ma bkyis sam/bdag gis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi bsam pa dag yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na/bdag gis
445a2(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig/bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
445a3(mdo sde): rgya bar ma gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mer me mdzad 'khor tshogs pa dang btsos pa'i spyan sngar sems can yongs
445a4(mdo sde): su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam brtan por btab ste/shin tu gnas par gyur lags so//de'i 'og tu 'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
445a5(mdo sde): 'bum phrag snyed 'tsho zhing gzhes pa 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar smon lam brtan po 'di lta bu dag btab ste/bdag gis der rtag par sems can yongs
445a6(mdo sde): su sbyin par dgyi ba'i slad du pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus chen pos shin tu brten par gnas par bgyi'o zhes brtson par bgyis lags so//da ltar bcom ldan
445a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar yang klu khro bo rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsol ba brtan po bgyis la/bdag gis da lta bu'i rtsol ba brtan pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa
445b1(mdo sde): ni bskal pa grangs ma mchis par skad cig tsam yang gtang ma myong lags so//bdag gis rtag par pha rol gnon pa'i rtsol pa dang /brtson pa brtan pos sems can yongs su smin
445b2(mdo sde): par bgyis lags pa rnams kyang yang yongs su smin par bgyi lags so//gzhan yang bdag gis klu'i dbang po dag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyis lags te/
445b3(mdo sde): klu glang po che rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas 'di dang /klu sbrul rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /bsnyen dga' bo 'di gnyis dang /klu rta rnams
445b4(mdo sde): kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'a dang /klu nya rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /klu sbal pa rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po yid bzang 'di rnams ste/klu de lta bu dag ni
445b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams la gnod pa bgyid par rngo thog pa dgo//klu'i rgyal po gzhan dag de lta bu de dag kyang rang rang gi mthus sems can rnams la de lta bur gnod pa bgyid par rngo theg pa dag go/'di
445b6(mdo sde): ltar theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis kyang so so rang rang gi 'khor dang /dpung gi tshogs rnams dus ma lags par de lta bur yang ba bsgrubs pas rang
445b7(mdo sde): rang gi 'khor rnams bskyod par bgyid lags so//'di ltar 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa chos sgron ma dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du
446a1(mdo sde): 'khor der mchis pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po klu'i drang srong la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal to//de'i tshe klu'i rgyal
446a2(mdo sde): po shin tu rab gnas stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gau la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten po'i
446a3(mdo sde): klu dang /klu'i rgyal po gang dag sgo nga las skye ba dang /mngal nas skye ba dang /drod dang gsher los skye ba dang /rdzus te skye ba'i klu de dag grang na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor nyan thos
446a4(mdo sde): rnams dang /'khor byang chub sems dpo' de dag la phan tshun byoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /yul 'khor dor sha kho na ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur lags
446a5(mdo sde): gnod sems ma mchis pa dang /sems mnyam pas gnas par 'gyur lagaso//gang dag yul 'khor de'i rgyal po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu
446a6(mdo sde): dad par 'gyur lags so//de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa'ang 'dzin par 'gyur lags so//dbang phyug gi rgyags pa dang dregs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par
446a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur legs so//dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur logs so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung nas
446b1(mdo sde): skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa/snod du gyur pa dang /snod du ma gyur pa lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dzin par bgyid lags so//gzhan yang yul 'khor
446b2(mdo sde): de na gang dag mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de'i tsher mer gyur pa de dag chos dang ldan pas skrod par bgyid lags so//de nas yul 'khor der dge sbyong dang /bram ze bsod snyoms pa
446b3(mdo sde): rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dag gis sngon lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa phul ba rnams rgyal rigs dge bas 'phrog par mi bgyid la/rgyal rigs dag pa blon po dang /mdun na 'don dang /
446b4(mdo sde): skye bo dmag mi rnams dang bcas pas tshogs sbyor ba ni don chen la brtson pa lagaso//snying po blangs pa lags so//lag brkyang nas lhag par gtong ba lags te/rgyal rigs dge ba de yul
446b5(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas par srung bar bgyi lag so//yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags so//de'i yul phyogs na rtsod pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang /so so'i 'khor dag sngar ji skad bstan pa bzhin bskrad par
446b6(mdo sde): bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis brlab pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
446b7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan lags so//mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba rnams kyi lam lags so//nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ral gri lags so//mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon lags so//lam
447a1(mdo sde): las rab turnams pa rnams kyi sgron ma lags s+ho//phung po rnams kyi spyan lags so//ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rlung lags so//dran 'gro rnams kyi srog shing
447a2(mdo sde): lags so//nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis nyams par gyur pa rnams kyi sdug sman lagaso//dgra rnams kyi rdo rje lags so//dge ba'i tsa ba thams cad kyi gter legs so//sdig
447a3(mdo sde): pas gos pa rnams kyi chab la gros so//nongs pa bgyid pa rnams kyi me long legs so//sems g.yengs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin lags so//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zam
447a4(mdo sde): tog lags so//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sa gzhi lags so//gzungs rnams kyi nor bu lags so//bzod pa rnams kyi khyim legs so//sa rnams kyi snod lags so//
447a5(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi mkhar lags so//nad pa rnams kyi sman pa lags so//bslab pa rnams kyi ri lags so//nyon mongs pas kun nas gdungs pa rnams kyi zla ba lags
447a6(mdo sde): so//lta ba ngan par lhung ba rnams kyi nyi ma lags so//ye shes kyi rgya mtsho lags s+ho//byang chub kyi phyogs pa rnams kyi phreng bar gyur pa legs so//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
447a7(mdo sde): shes kyi bum pa bzang po lags so//chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba lags so//chos gos ngur smig 'di ni sems can rnams la chos kyi char
447b1(mdo sde): dbab pa'i don gyi slad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ni/bcom ldan 'das
447b2(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa 'jig par bgyid cing dge slong dag la tho 'tsham par bgyid pa nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung ba snod du gyur pa dang /snod du ma gyur pa'i lus la gnod pa
447b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang /nor 'phrog pa dang /srog gi bar chad dag bgyid pa'i bar du'o//yul 'khor der gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /
447b4(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa la gla she bar 'gyur te/de dag gis de'i yul 'khor du thob mo dang /rtsod pa dang /
447b5(mdo sde): lo nyes dang /nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag 'byung bar bgyid lags//dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang /than chen dang /lhags pa dang /tsha ba dang /rlung dang /nyi mas
447b6(mdo sde): gdungs pa dag gis sa bon dang /myu gu dang /'dab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /sman dang /ro rnams ma rung bar bgyid kyang de na klu rnams la skyon ni ma mchis
447b7(mdo sde): lags te/de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na yul gyi bud med bzang mos zas ngan pa
448a1(mdo sde): 'tshal nas de dbug dri mi bda' bar 'gyur lag so//de bzhin du rgyal ri/Dagadol pas kyang rgyal rigs kyi chos rnams spangs nas dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid
448a2(mdo sde): na yul phyogs thams cad srung ba'i lha nas yi dgas mthu bo che dog gis bar du khros par 'gyur te/de dag gis yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid la/glu dang klu chen po rnams
448a3(mdo sde): grags pa ma lags pas kyang gos par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag po rgyal po rnams rgyal po'i bslab pa'i gzhi ga nas par
448a4(mdo sde): bstan pa de dang de dag mtho ris dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba lnga brtson pa yin no//gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa rgyal rigs kyi bslab pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni
448a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i bor la gzhol ba yin no//klu'i bdag po nga rang gi 'khor bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bstan pa des na de dag da ltar gyi dus dang /ma 'ongs
448a6(mdo sde): pa'i dus su ngo'i bstan pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par mi byed par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags so//btsun pa bde
448a7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa de ltar lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor gang dang gang dag na grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /ri bregs kyi
448b1(mdo sde): gnas myal na ba stan las nyan dus na la \u0f7fsa dang stan thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa ded bdag ga 'khor gang dag klu ga snod pa na
448b2(mdo sde): na pa'i buM b+ha dang / bum nga / lekhor po dang / lakhi mo rnams dus mi legs pa dzi nA~M dang /si g+ha h+Na/char michedang /phan chen dag gtong bar bgying sa
448b3(mdo sde): lcags mche dang /shin tu che ba dang /nyi mas gsus pa dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /sman gyi ro dang /los
448b4(mdo sde): spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas de'i lus thams cad 'khums par gyur cig/de dgA rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus
448b5(mdo sde): por 'gyur cig/rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig/longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/spobs pa med par gyur cig/don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgrags
448b6(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//tad+ya thA/nAM ga dzan du shrI/mA gau m+b+hi na/nA ga d+hA ra g+hAg+h+ra~M g+hAk+Sh+ma/dzaM lA g+h+rag+h+rA a bi mAm+bu rA ga/sa ha swa mu khe/ka lA ti mA bus/nA ga stA maT+TA ri/dza ya ba pha la/
448b7(mdo sde): mu sha kr-i swA hA/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis de nyid du legs so zhes bya ba byin no//de nyid kyi tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor rnams shugs drag por 'khrugs
449a1(mdo sde): shing dngangs par gyur to//de'i tshe glu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /bsnyen dga' bo gnyis stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar/
449a2(mdo sde): bya btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol po de dag gzhan la sbyin par ma dad cing bdag nyid longs
449a3(mdo sde): spyod par 'tshal la/'jungs pa longs spyod la sems kun tu 'dzin cing lag mi rkyang pas dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /'dron po slong ba rnams kun nas
449a4(mdo sde): tshim par mi bgyid lags so//pho brang 'khor ba dang /ljongs kyi mi dang /'khor rnams yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par mi bgyid lags so//rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la
449a5(mdo sde): yul phyogs srung ba'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /lha ma yin dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang khros par gyur te/de dag gi
449a6(mdo sde): yul 'khor du thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /mu ge dang /nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag kun tu 'byung bar bgyid lags so//'bru dang /sman gyi ro rnams mi rung bar bgyid/
449a7(mdo sde): kyang de na klu dang /klu chen po rnams la skyon ni ma mchis legs te/de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'a
449b1(mdo sde): dper bgyi na phyis sa khung gi dri ma bda' ba bser mas 'tshal dri mi bda' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs gdol pa rnams kyis kyang yul phyogs
449b2(mdo sde): thams cad srung bdag khros par gyur te/yul 'khor de ma rung bar bgyid lags so//klu rnams kyang grags pa me lags pos gos par 'gyur legs so///
449b3(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa ste tha ma//yang na klu thams cad bdag gi bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bdag gis lung dbog par bgyi ste/yul 'khor gang dang grang dag na grong dang /grong khyer dang //
449b4(mdo sde): grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing thos pa mang po sbyin gnas
449b5(mdo sde): de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa der bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang /klu mo dang /klu rgan po dang /klu'i bu pho dang /klu'i bu mo dang /klu'i 'khor pho dang /klu'i 'khor mo sgo nga las skye ba
449b6(mdo sde): dang /mngal nas skye ba dang /drod gsher las skye ba dang /rdzus te skye ba dag dus ma legs par rdzi chur dang /ser drag dang /char mo tshe dang /phan chen dag gtong bar bgyi dam/lhags
449b7(mdo sde): mo che dang /shin tu tsha ba dang /nyi mas gdungs po dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /sman dang /ro dang /longs spyod
450a1(mdo sde): dang /yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal ba dra bgyid na klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas de'i lus thams cad 'khums par gyur cig/de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral
450a2(mdo sde): nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig/longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/spobs pa med par gyur cig/don byed mi nus par gyuraci
450a3(mdo sde): ces mnas bsgrag par bgyi'o//tad+ya thA/karna g+h+ra~M me/kun b+ha rak+She/bar mgu Ne/a ka la k+Shi/bi sha nAM/bi mArga k+Shi/kun bi ra ge/A ta sa le/nA yan tum b+he/kA la ku
450a4(mdo sde): shwe/nang gu pra b+he/gan d+ha ra ba saM swA hA/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so//zhes bgyi ba stsal lags so//de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba nas sde
450a5(mdo sde): ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o//tAd+ya thA//na ba b+hi she/na ba na me b+hi she/A no k+She/na ba ku&dza b+he shwe/kha ga bai kha/sa rA tra na D+ha/pA pa ya si le/na rA ya Na gu Ne/bi na stA
450a6(mdo sde): le/dA sha kra maM/a k+Shu da nye se/A nI sa bi swA hA/klu'i rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba nas sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o//tad+ya thA/hi ma bau mAM/ba li k+Shi na gu ne/ru ni bin+na tri Ne/tsa rak+Shad+ha
450a7(mdo sde): re/mai b+h+ya satwa ma/b+h+ye Ta Tu ka she/dru mo de/mai ye tan kus/ma cika/tsa 'd-i/nAnd traM/kan+yag tu le swA hA/sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o//de tshe klu'i rgyal po yid
450b1(mdo sde): bstan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang /klu chen po de dag ni sgong las
450b2(mdo sde): skye ba dang /mngal nas skye ba dang /drod gsher las skye ba dang /rdzus te skye ba dag lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar deng ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gis rgyal
450b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi chos spangs nas dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid de/sems can dmyal ba mnar ma mchis pa'i bar dag la gzhol bar gnas so//rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gi
450b4(mdo sde): skyon gyis klu rnams mnongs bzhin du grags pas ma lags par gos par 'gyur lags so//rgyu des na klu rnams las kyi sgrib pa dag bgyid par 'gyur logs so//de lta lags
450b5(mdo sde): pas bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyi zhing gzung bar bgyi ste/dper bgyi na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des yul gyi bud med bzang mo khrus legs par
450b6(mdo sde): bgyis te spos kyis byugs nas gos mchog tu bzang ba bskon te/yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i phreng ba mang po dag btags shing dpung rgyan dang /
450b7(mdo sde): gser skud dang /sor gdub dang /lag rgyan dang /rkang rgyan dag gis brgyan nas glang po che'i gzhon pa la bskyon te/'khor phal mo che dang lhan cig khrid pa de bzhin du da ltar 'khor
451a1(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyul bcwa sa dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag cag rnams dung 'gro'i skye gnas su bsdus pa'i rdzasam
451a2(mdo sde): snangs rgyas la/mchog tu bya ba dang /nga rgyal dang /dgos pa'i dri mas basmos pa/bdug cag k+Sha tham sa cad rgyags pas myos pa ma mdzes pa'i cho kyis chus bsdus
451a3(mdo sde): legs so//bdag cag la de tshwa shes pa dang /khrel yod pa'i gos bskyon lags so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi phreng bas bcings legs so//
451a4(mdo sde): bdag cag gi sems dang /yid dang /rnam par shes pa dge bzod pa dang //gzungs dang /sa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan legs so//theg pa chen po'i
451a5(mdo sde): shing rta ngag gis bteg lags so//gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs mi lnga dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i
451a6(mdo sde): tshogs yongasu dag pas bskor nas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi gtamaM dag smyon pa der bdag cag marmyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/dri ltar bdag cig bcom ldan 'das
451a7(mdo sde): kyi bka' la bai kur sti bgyid cing 'dzin par bgyid lags so//de lta lags pas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la shin tu gnas par
451b1(mdo sde): bgyid lags so//grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang na sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi
451b2(mdo sde): theg pa pa dang /theg pa chen po bdag khyim na gnas pa 'am/rab tu byung ba 'am/tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/thos pa mang ba 'am/thos pa
451b3(mdo sde): nyung ba 'am/brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'am/le lo can nam/mnyam par bzhag pa'am/mnyam par ma bzhag pa 'am/den pa dang ldan pa 'am/dran pa nyams pa rnams bcom

451b5(mdo sde): rnam gsum gang yang rung ba dag la rab tu zhugs pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa de dang der bdag cag yid kyis dge'i zhong dang pa

451b7(mdo sde): bdag gi 'khor klu dang /klu mo dang /klu rgan po dang /klu rgan mo dang /klu'i bu dang /klu'i bu mo dang /klu'i 'khor pho dang /klu'i 'khor mo dag dus ma legs par rdzi char dang /

452a2(mdo sde): kyi lo tog dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /sman gyi ro dang /longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na klu de dag gis badrag cig
452a3(mdo sde): bslus pas de dag thams cad kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig/de dag rdzu 'phrul nyams nos 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/rims nad kyis kun tu gradungs par gyur cig/

452a7(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin te/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar bya ba ni legs so legos so zhes smras nas/thoms cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor de dag shugs
452b1(mdo sde): drag po 'khrugs shing dngangs la kun tu 'gul zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang /kun tu 'khor bar gyur to//de'i tshe dri za'i drang srong dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba bstan las langs te/
452b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag la dgongs su gsol//da ltar dang ma 'ongs
452b3(mdo sde): pA'i dus su gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa blun po mkhas so snyam pa'o//nga rgyal can/nga rgyal dang rgyags pas nyams pa/'jig rten pha rol la mi lta bu/g.yo sgyu can/snying rje ma
452b4(mdo sde): mchis pa/dge slong la tho 'tsham par bgyid pa nas tha na bcom ldan 'das kyi skad du skyabs su mchis nas nye bar gnas pa/skra bregs te gos ngur smrig dgos pa la tho 'tsham pa

453a7(mdo sde): thos rnams la mtho 'tsham pa de dag de ltar gyur cig/de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i dri za'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tha

453b2(mdo sde): dga' skyed nyams su myong bar bgyid na bdag cag kyang mna'i khongs su gtogs par gyur cig/de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis legaso//

453b4(mdo sde): to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'ongs bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo chen po
453b5(mdo sde): bshad par bgyi ste/rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po sgo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de'i rna ba'i nad dag rab tu zhi bar bgyid do//de'i 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang
453b6(mdo sde): dang /gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid do//gal te na bsrabasro par 'gyur ro//rgya mtsho'i shun pa man dza na la gsang sngags kyi tshig
453b7(mdo sde): 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal rigs kyi rnga la bskus nas rnga de'i sgra gang dang gang gis rna lam du grag po de dang de'i 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug la
454a1(mdo sde): /sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro//de dang de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la shin tu dga' zhing bkur sti dang /bla mar byed
454a2(mdo sde): pab dang /ri mo byed pa dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro//chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'jug par 'gyur ro//'jig rten pha rol la lta ba dang /longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa dang

454a7(mdo sde): gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de bshad par 'tshal gyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bdag la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du gsol/
454b1(mdo sde): de ni mthu che zhing stobs che la pha rol gnon pa snang bar bgyid pa chen po lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter dang /ye shes yongs su
454b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter du 'gyur ba lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdom pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen kyi sdom pa dang /
454b3(mdo sde): dge sbyong gri sdom pa dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa la/gnas pa snod du gyur pa dang /snod du ma gyur pa dag gis gdugs deng rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs

454b5(mdo sde): smon lam zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po lan 'bum skyed du yang dang yang dran par bgyid pa de ni rgyal rigs rnams dang /bram ze'i rigs rnams dang /rje'u rigs rnams dang /dmangs rigs
454b6(mdo sde): rnams dad par bgyid pa nas sems can thams cad kyi bar du shin tu mngon par dad par bgyid pa lags so//thams cad longs spyod pa dang /yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po mchog dang
454b7(mdo sde): mi 'bral zhing mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur lags so//de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams dang /skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur logaso so//tad+ya thA/
455a1(mdo sde): tri nasany+dzi ke/br-i tI Na bi ma be/ka ra prA k+She/b+hU ta s+yA n+ye tsa/pa ra tsi m+me/a b+hak+She/ak+Sha ya yo byaM/a d+h+ya ma/ni mi re/shI ta bstAr+Na/a gu dza d+hA dz+nyA/

455a7(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi thos pa mang po'i tshogs rgyas par byed pa dang ston pa ni skyes bu dam pa legaso legs so//de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur

455b4(mdo sde): bas 'di ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur te/'dus pa chen po de lta bu dag byung bar bgyis lags so//nang gu dpal rdul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di ni mthu che bas lo tog
455b5(mdo sde): thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa lags so//sa bon dang /myu gu dang /sdong bu dang /'dab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /shing dang /'bru dang /sman dang /ro rnams skyed par

455b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims can du bgyid pa dang /thos par bgyid pa dang /shes par bgyid pa dang /byams pa dang /snying rje can du bgyid pa dang /thabs dang ldan par bgyid pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs
456a1(mdo sde): /kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du ston par bgyid pa lags so//tad+yathA/anar+d+ha b+h+ra mr-i/g+ha bak+Sha bI dza~M/gu lo tsA lo maM/phaT/lo ma/wI ya/ku s+yAma?/bkra
456a2(mdo sde): muda? me De/rU dza ba ra me/tsa Ta na ba/ba ma Ti/bi Shu lang ge/a ba b+ha su n+we ha sa ga bAk+ShaM/lo ma b+hu dze k+Sho/gam b+hi ra ba su me/a no ma ya/sa re bya la shi to ye swA hA/

456a4(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig 'di chu la lan steng gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing dang //shing dang /lo tog sna tshogs la gtor tam rnga dang /rdza rnga dang /dung dag la sngags nas de dag
