456b1(mdo sde): snyoms can smras su ga gas pa gzhan dgags m+b+ha spyan rgyu marnal//donas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam du la gzhon nur gyur padol rdzogs sa nas bya ba kun
456b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod gling bzhi pa 'drir sbyin pa chen po'i dpal gyi shing rta la zhon nas/rigs kyi bu 'dir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems can dpag tu med pa rnams rton par byed pa ni/
456b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod legs so legs so//de nas de nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/rigs kyi
456b4(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis de ltar byas pa ni legs so legs so//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di spyang
456b5(mdo sde): ces smras so//byams pa khyod la bdag gis dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po sbyin gyis/gzungs chen po de nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i
456b6(mdo sde): glo bgos nus/'dir sems can rnams la tshig gis chos ston nA ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pi'o stobs bskyed pa'i chos de dag sems can+d+ra gang dag gis thos pa'i/
456b7(mdo sde): sdig pa'i sems dang /sdig pa'i lci ba dag spong bar byed do//sdig pa'i grogs po dang /sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dag spong bar byed do//sems kyis byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dge
457a1(mdo sde): pa'i rtsa ba dag yid la byed par 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba can du 'gyur ro//sems mi dge
457a2(mdo sde): ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag las ldog par 'gyur ro//sems dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rnam par gnas par 'gyur ro//sems sems can thams cad la mngon par
457a3(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur ro//gzungs chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi char 'bebs par byed pa'i dgra thams cad rab tu
457a4(mdo sde): dad par byed cing ba sh+yes gnyen thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o//tad+ya thA/li byA tA swa re kA shA ya/ba ra me sa me bag g+he/dA rad dza lau su to k+Sha/su to k+She sum hA thA
457a5(mdo sde): k+Sha raM su h+ma phung ge/gau a ba lo ka da le/sid+d+hi bi bak+ShaM/d+hA nan pri ba re/a bin+d+ha lung ba/so tsi ra tsa la/a ba b+hA swa re/ba rA ha shAt+taM/e ka ha da to yaM/sa mAM d+hi ka ra Ni/
457a6(mdo sde): li dzA ba ti/ma hA d+ha b+hU tA ku se/a ra Na nI la/ma le me sho me/nI la ku su me swA hA/dpal me tog sar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis nI byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
457a7(mdo sde): chen po khyod kyi byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas sems can rnams la chos ston na/de'i sgra tha na sems can srog tshogs su gyur pa phra mo chung ngu gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa de dag
457b1(mdo sde): gisoms kyu rnyog pa nye ba zhi bur byed pa dang /de dag gi sems dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par yang 'gyur na mor gyur pa rnams la lha smos kyang rdza dgos/sems tsa la la
457b2(mdo sde): dag gis tshor dbab pa'i phyir dri za dang /klu'i gnas dag tug rgyus chen po 'di bzlas brjod byas te/na la shum gyi bye ma dang /oM raN+Da'i mar du bsres bya la dus lan
457b3(mdo sde): skyong du bstags nas/gos kyi mtha' mar phur ma byas te byon par bcug na/des na de la klu rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/tshararo gyi rgyun chen po 'di 'begs par byed do//de'i tshe lus
457b4(mdo sde): der 'dus pa'i klu dang /klu chen po rnams kyis dpal me tog saR+sha pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di thos nas sems rangs pa da /sdang sems med pa dang /sems rab tu
457b5(mdo sde): dga' bo dang /sems byams pa dang ldan pa dang /sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta b.rarA gnas par gyur to//sems dkon mchog gsum la dad cing bkur sti dang /bla
457b6(mdo sde): mar byed pa dang /ri mo byed pa dag thob par gyur to//sems dud 'gror skye bu'i rang gi sdigs pa'i las dag rab tu 'chags pa dang /sems theg pa chen po bla ni med pa la
457b7(mdo sde): 'jug par gnas par gyur to//klu dang /klu chen po de dag thams cad kyi nang nas mthu ci yod pa dang /ci nas bdag gis de na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
458a1(mdo sde): /phyi kha cig ni gser mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so//ga ni ngul dang /a ga rA dang /chu smos dang /gshin dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po byamya dang
458a2(mdo sde): ta ma la'i lo ma'i char dag mngon par 'bebs pa nas kha cig ni ut+pa la dang /me tog sna tshogs dang /ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba ngan sna tshogs
458a3(mdo sde): dang /gser skud dang /mu tig gi do shal gyi bar dag gi char mngon par 'bebs so//de nas klu dang /klu chen po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'ongs ga la ba de logs su thal
458a4(mdo sde): mo sbyar bar btud nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag cag ni dkon mchog gsum la sems shin tu legs par rab tu zhugs pa
458a5(mdo sde): lagos so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag 'di rnams kyis dam bca' bar bgyi ba ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljos ga nga/
458a6(mdo sde): gang dag na dpal me tog saR+sha pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa dang /de bzhin du gzungs lhag mchu khyim snying po zhes bgyi ba dang /mtshon che'i stobs shes bgyi ba dang /
458a7(mdo sde): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyis pa dang /nang gu dang la rdul zhes bgyi ba dang /dpal me tog sar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po rnams dang /rgyal po chen
458b1(mdo sde): bzhis byashad pa'i gzungs de dag dang /klu'i snying po bzhi po dag grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang dag tu re re tsam yang ston tamA/'chang ngam/
458b2(mdo sde): rab tu sgrogs sam/dran par bgyid pa de dang de dag tu bdag cag gis dus dus su char 'bibs pa dang /gdugs dang /bser ma dag gtong bar bgyi'o//dus ma lags par ni ma lags so//
458b3(mdo sde): dedang der bdag cag gis phyi dgra dang /nang 'khrug dang /thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /gnod sems dang /nad dang /mi ngas dang /mu ge dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi lags so//de dang der bdag
458b4(mdo sde): cag gis skyid pa dang /lo legs pa dang /dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bsgrub par bgyi lags so//de dang der sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang /myu gu dang /sdong bu dang /'dab ma
458b5(mdo sde): dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /shing dang /sman dang /ro dag mi nyams par 'phel bar bgyi lags so//longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa phal cher dri zhim pa dang /ro zhim
458b6(mdo sde): pad+mad /snum pa dang /'jam pa dag tu bsgrub par bgyi lags so//bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rgyal po rnams kyang gcig lnga gcig byams pa'i sems dang /phan
458b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang /'khon ma mchis pa'i sems dang /rtson pa ma mchis pa'i sems su bsgrub par bgyi lags so//de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rig
459a1(mdo sde): dang //gnod sbyin rnams nas dge bsnyen dag gi bar dag tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsgrub pa bgyi lags so//gdan gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa der
459a2(mdo sde): nang phan tshun sems mthun par bsgrub par bgyi lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo //thams cad dang ldan
459a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byi no//de nas byang chub sde de'i ri'i snying po kyang leg so zhes bya ba byi'o//de nas bac+doMs kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dral chog khyod
459a4(mdo sde): la snying brtse ba'i grogs 'di dag yod na 'dir sems can yongs su smon par bya ba'i phyir da dung du ci'i phyir gdul ba'i tshogs rnams gzhug par mi nus/dpal lha mo chen mos gsol
459a5(mdo sde): pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba len cing grogs dge ba'i
459a6(mdo sde): bshes gnyen mthun pa de lta bu dag dang phrad pa thob lags so//da ltar bdag kyang grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen/mthun pa khyod lta bu dang phrad pa lags so//bla na med pa yang dag
459a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de'i lag tu thob ste/de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang brjod par bgyi lags so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen
459b1(mdo sde): gyis yongs su zin pa/brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu gnas par blta bar bgyi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dpal chog shes khyod/
459b2(mdo sde): kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su/smin par bya
459b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba len la/bsdu bo'i dngos po bzhi po dag la brtson zhing der brtson pa brtan pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no//
459b4(mdo sde): grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bus yongs su zin pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te/de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'ang brjod
459b5(mdo sde): par bya'o//des rnam par gnon pa'ang brjod par bya'o//mngal gyi skyon las thar par yang brjod par bya'o//mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par bya'o//de
459b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang /byin gyis brlabs par yang brjod par bya'o//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin tu gnas par brjod par bya'o//de nas
459b7(mdo sde): brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pa/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slang du 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
460a1(mdo sde): narlo g+h+ya /rgyun pa rnams skyenas can rnams kyi las nga/ngas su spyod byadag la gnod pa bsnyen lags/g+ha2 lbu pa/lha'i dang kya
460a2(mdo sde): rkyen gnyis kyis 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'di kyi dang /klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do//gnyis gang zhe na/'jo
460a3(mdo sde): chags kyi dbang dang /khro ba'i dbang gis dus ma yin pa'i sprin dag 'byung bar byed cing rdzi'i char dang ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do//lcags pa dang /tsha ba dag 'byung bar byed//
460a4(mdo sde): des na 'dir sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang /myu gu dang /'dab ma dang /mau tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /spyan dong /ro dag tshig par byed do//skems par byed do//
460a5(mdo sde): 'brul bar byed do//ma rungs par byed do//de nas sems can rnams longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa dang /mi ldan pas lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi sdig pa'i laso ma
460a6(mdo sde): byabade ba rnam po sna tshogs dag kun tu spyod par byed do//las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa de sa na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad kyang sreg par byed do//skems par byed do//thal ba
460a7(mdo sde): rlog par byed do//dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spong zhing ngan song gsum po dag la gzhol bar byed do//kha cig gos dang /bza' ba dang /btong ba tsam gyi phyir tshe gcig gis de lta
460b1(mdo sde): bung sdig pa'i las mtshams med pa dag gis byur du kun tu spyod par byed de/de bskal pa myung po zhig gi bar du phyis mir skye ba 'byor myi 'gyur ro//gal te de dag yun ring po 'das nus brgya
460b2(mdo sde): la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob nas yang kha cig ni yin lagro nyam so par 'gyur ro//kha cig ni dran pa nyams por 'gyur ro//gdol pa'i rig su yang skye bar 'gyur ro//g.yung po'i rigs
460b3(mdo sde): dang /sgrog ma mkhan gyi rigs dang /bkren pa dngul po'i rigs rnams su 'du skye bar 'gyur ro//bza' ba dang btung ba'i longs spyod dang /yongasu spyod pa dag dang yang bral bar 'gyur la/
460b4(mdo sde): yang rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi sgrib pa mi bzang pa dgu kun tu spyod par byed do//yang kha cig ngan song gsum po dang /mnar med pa
460b5(mdo sde): ngag tu'ang gzhol bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par 'gyur ro//ngan song
460b6(mdo sde): gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong bur 'gyur ro//gsol pa/sdug bsngal gang chung zad ci byung ba thams cad ni zas kyi rkyen lus gyur pa lagra te/
460b7(mdo sde): zas mi mchis ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'ang mi mchis lags so//de ni sa de'i tshe brgya byin gzi brjid drim meng pas tshigasu bcid de 'di nyid ces gsol to//srid pa'i dog gis bskyang bas no//
461a1(mdo sde): du ba dang ni rgod par bgyid//nye bar gnas shing ltung bar bgyid//kun tu spyod cing rnam par rgyug/sa gAzhi dag lA ti lnga brdungs ltar//sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gnod
461a2(mdo sde): par bgyid//lhar bcasna 'jig rten thams cad la//da ltar sred pas gnod par bgyid//kye ma sred pas zhugs pa yis//srid pa'i rtse mir mthar gtigs byes//de ltar zhags 'ang
461a3(mdo sde): rgyu che ba//khazlas dag gis rgyu las byung //so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyi//sred pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings//ri dgas zhags pas bcings pa ltar//'bros pa dag tu nus ma lag
461a4(mdo sde): sbyor bcas 'jig rten sems can dag/sred pas gor bgyid rtsol ba ltar//gar gzhung dag la gar mkhan bzlas//de nas gar bgyid rtsol mi nus//srid pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas
461a5(mdo sde): ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar//btung ba myos bgying bskrad pa yis//myos pa dag tu mi bgyid do//sred pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag gis//skye bo brlams nas 'khyal pa ltar//

461a7(mdo sde): par mi gnas so//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//zhe sdang khri bas skye dgu brlams//sems kyang g.yeng 'gyur de yis mdza/
461b1(mdo sde): thams cad m+b+hi 'tshal zhing //bzod drug las la spyod par bgyid//mi dge ba la gnas bgyid pa//pa ma dag la ram gro chung //gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyis pa//do/na mchog gsum
461b2(mdo sde): brnyas par bgyid//skying brtse snying rje ma mchis pa//'jigs pagyid gtum po drag shul can//khri sems dbang gis de dag ni//sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas//sems can 'dri dag khro ba'i
461b3(mdo sde): rgyus//gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid//yang dang yang ni ngan song du//sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir//sdig pa'i sems kyis bring gyur cing //dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs nas kyang //srid pa'i mchog
461b4(mdo sde): nilhung ba ste//mun pa mun gnag gzhol ba po//de 'dra'i sems n+dan don smad//byang chub sems dpa'i snying brtse ba'i//bsam pas bdug bde btang nas kyang //sems can sdig pa bsal slad du//byang chu/
461b5(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa na//bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos sum gyis//sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing //chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyid//sems can 'ga'i don slad du//lus dang srog dag btang nas
461b6(mdo sde): kyang //dka' thub brtul zhugs spyad ldan pa//dka' ba dag ni mang du spyad//gang tshe sems can 'ga' skad du//bskal brgyar sdug bsngal sel bgyid nA//sems can rnams slad yun ring du//'khor
461b7(mdo sde): bar sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi//sems can yongs su smin slad gnaso//de 'dra'i bsam dang ldan pa yis//sems can srid pa'i bsam pa can//sems ni byang chub mngon bgyid stsal//de nas dpal lha mo
462a1(mdo sde): mamatham mamams a mamatshas ma tham amam thas thas mamathama.as tham ma yamaHtham ma.a/gatha' ma ma pa thamamamamamamathamam
462a2(mdo sde): chen mos//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba phul nas smras pa//gleng bzhi pa 'di'i sems can rnams kyi/

462a4(mdo sde): ba yang dag par chad pa ma rungs pa/gautum po/drugra shul can kun tu sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral ba dang /byang chub kyi sa bon kho bzhag par rngo thog go//de nas byang chub sems
462a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs nas phyogs bcur bltos te 'di skad ces smras so//sangs rgyas bcom
462a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol//gang gis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang /myu gu dang /'dab ma dang /me tog
462a7(mdo sde): dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /spyan dang / dang /sa'i bcud dang /gzi byin+da dang /sems can gyi gzi b+hin+da dang /dam pa'i chos kyi ro dang /snying ku dang /gzi byin dag mi nyams shing /
462a8(mdo sde): 'phel bar bgyid pa dang /ngom pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gtsang par bgyid pa dang /gang gi de longs spyod pa dang /nye bar spyod po thams cad kyis
462b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /sdig pa las zlog par bgyid pa dang /byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rngo thogs pa dang /gang gis 'dir sems can de dag thams cad
462b2(mdo sde): kyis dran song rnams yongs su sbyangs nas mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /glang gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar phyogs bcu na gang dag
462b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus par bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol//tad+ya thA/mu ni shi ba/mu ni na twe/mu ni pa la/mu ni sa lo/san ta
462b4(mdo sde): u sak+Shi ti/k+Sha nu pA Na nI la ba ya sarba bI dza ba stil li swA hA//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so//zhes bya ba gnang nas dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
462b5(mdo sde): dpal tshig shes khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang /myu gu dang /lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang /sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom
462b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa me lus pa thams ts+tshed kyis byin gyis brlabs so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya b+hin+da kau shi ka sau bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces
462b7(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar gzung bar dgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
463a1(mdo sde): 'o//sa'i bdud 'phel bar byed pa byes bya/ting nge 'dzin gyi rdul 'byor sems can yongs su smin pa byung ba nas /bcom ldan 'das kyis
463a2(mdo sde): gyis bka' stsal nas//dad po lham nan mo dang /byang chub sems sh+tha sems dpa' nan de'i'i snying po dang /thams cadu dang ldan pa'i khyo rnams coM ldan
463a3(mdo sde): 'dus kyis smras la yi ring te mngon par bstod //'dus parten mug patsun pa'i na ste las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dul byed cig ce bya ma
463a4(mdo sde): /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang /zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur
